Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Great place.  Will return.  Comfortable, clean, reasonable, and terrific to see a historic building repurposed.  Loved the panels showing the history.  Close to the freeway, but not loud.  The nearby train didn't bother us at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and the history of the building.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: Switch plate falling off electric junction box.  Beat up furniture.  Very dirty windows.  Fur and white stains on carpet.  Told hotel didn‚Äôt have any conditioner!!! Not enough towels.  Lumpy pillows.  Told couldn‚Äôt bring service dog into dining room (illegal).

Summary Heading: Convenient to OC Great Park - but, Not Recommended
Summary: We were in Irvine for a soccer tournament at the Great Park, and chose this place for the location, which was a super convenient five minute drive to the fields,   There is a gas station, restaurant and fast food place within a one minute walk, which are all positives.  The front desk clerk was kind and helpful and, unasked, provided goodie bags for my kids, which was a really nice touch.  We had read other reviews about the train track noise, so we asked for a quiet room and were given a room in the older, wooden building (not the grain silo), so my review only pertains to the older building.    Our room was on the second floor, and it was quiet. However, the mattresses were old and saggy, and the AC breaker had been tripped sometime before our arrival so the room was hot and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are glad our location was convenient for the events you attended at the Great Park. We apologize for the problems you encountered with your room and our Continental Breakfast.  We do hope to receive renovations in the near future.  We will share your feedback with our Team so we can improve.

Summary: Horrible mattress and pillows. You wake up with back pain. Dirty carpets. Smelly room. Don‚Äôt even bother with their so called breakfast. You get a lot more at other hotels for what they charge you. I‚Äôm never coming to this La Quinta location again.
Manager Response: We received your review and are sorry for the problems you encountered with your room and our breakfast.  We do hope to get some renovations in the near future.  We will share your comments about the breakfast with our Corporate Office.  Our location is currently required to follow the La Quinta Standards for our Continental Breakfast.  It would be great if we had more options for our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.

Summary: We had no idea that one of their buildings was a converted grain silo.  We were shocked when we got to the room - hexigon shaped with 6 inch thick gray cement walls!  I'm glad we got a room with the king bed and sofa bed, otherwise we would have felt like we were in a prison cell.  We had friends staying in the main building and they said their room was dated, and that our room was nicer.  We were comfortable, I liked that the bathroom sink was outside the shower/toilet room so I could get ready in the morning and someone could still take a shower.  Was a little disappointed that the only hot food for breakfast was waffles.  Pool was not heated.  There are active train tracks on one side of the silo building - you might want to ask for a room on the other side.  Our room did not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate your feedback.  We apologize that the continental breakfast fell short of your expectations.  We do hope the Corporate Office will allow our location to make changes and offer some hot options in the future along with some renovations.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: Best rooms in our entire visit.  About 20 minutes from Laguna Beach.  Employees were nice and friendly.  Great place to stay. The rooms were nice and clean. Property within walking distance of restaurants. Pet friendly!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We appreciate the kind words and are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to you next visit to Irvine.

Summary: My wife and I always stay here on our trips to nearby Disneyland. We always book a room in the converted silo building because of the unique layout of the rooms. Plus, I sleep better when a freight train passes every so often!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review! We are excited to hear you enjoyed the uniqueness of our hotel. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Fun times down in the OC
Summary: Went down for a lovely little getaway always enjoy staying here. Wish I could spend more time, was too cold for the pool but maybe next trip down partake in the pool and hot tub. I love that they‚Äôre dog friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving a review, we are happy to see you enjoy spending so much time here. We look forward to having you back with us.

Summary: I enjoyed my weekend stay at La Quinta.  My room was clean and comfortable!  The room was also very quiet.  I want to thank Franklin, our front desk personnel, who provided exceptional service and displayed excellent professionalism.  He helped to make the stay more enjoyable!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind comments, we are very happy to hear of Franklin's excellent professionalism. We will be happy to share your comments with our staff who we are sure will be encouraged. We look forward to having you back with us.

Summary: First time I stayed at this La Quinta and my wife and I were amazed at the uniqueness of the rooms in completely renovated old grain storage building. ( More traditional La Quinta rooms in main building) They kept the raw concrete hexagonal silos and converted them into really great rooms.Loved the character of this room. Hexagonal in shape and because it was constructed with solid thick concrete walls with wide hallways between either side, it was especially quiet inside in our side of Silo building facing parking lot. May be less quiet on side facing RR tracks,
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We are very happy to hear you appreciated the historic side of our property. We look forward to seeing you for your next visit.

Summary: Clean and nice. I always had a good experience whenever I stayed here. Staff is nice and friendly and the room is clean and quiet. The location is also pretty convenient because there are a lot of restaurants near by.
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful feedback. I'll be happy to share your comments of the "nice and friendly" staff, who I'm sure will be encouraged by your remarks. We look forward to having you back with us.

Summary: We have stayed at the Irvine Spectrum location and have always been totally satisfied. We specifically like that it was a historic location. The breakfast is allways clean and cared for. The rooms are well taken care of. Everyone in the staff from the front desk to the maids always say hello and greet you with a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We will be happy to share your kind comments with our staff who I'm sure will be thrilled and encouraged for the future. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Excellent place close to everything, the staff very friendly and very helpful. Across from the property is Knowlwood (best hamburgs in town), Denny's and Jack N the Box and the train station is just over the bridge.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed review. We are happy to hear the location was to your liking. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Full toilet, glib front desk agent, and a train!!!
Summary: Wyndam has somehow hitched its horse to this poor excuse of a hotel. Smart mouthed check in agent, a toilet Not flushed and full at check in, cigarette butts everywhere.  Went to Cabo (stayed at a Wyndam) but left our car and shuttled to airport.  Hotel front desk agent made smart mouthed quips at check in but figured he was poorly trained and let it go. Checked in to room in old building discovered waste in the toilet that wouldn‚Äôt flush in first 5 minutes. Told ‚Äú we don‚Äôt have maintenance available would you like a plunger?‚Äù More cigarette butts than an AA meeting literally everywhere.  Came back five days later to pick up car and sleep but accosted by same smart azzz front desk agent. ‚Äú didn‚Äôt expect to see you again !‚Äù What a punk. Same cigarette butts in same places as 5
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We apologize for the experience you encountered.  Rude service and poor cleanliness are not acceptable and there is no excuse.  We are sorry.  Your comments and feedback will be shared with our Team so we can improve.  Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Not like it used to be
Summary: I have been starting at this hotel for at least 5yrs. The year before last the upkeep of the property especially the pool area had gone downhill. It's much better now but they decided to take the fridge and microwave Out of the king size rooms which is really inconvenient for someone with children
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are glad that our location worked well for you the past 5 years.  We appreciate the loyalty.  We understand your request to have a Micro/Fridge in your room, especially when traveling with a family.  We are working to make that a standard in all of our rooms in the future.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Irvine.

Summary Heading: Great value, clean rooms, friendly staff
Summary: I was very pleased.  The La Quinta was much less expensive than other hotels in the area and just as comfortable!  Very friendly staff.  Also, one of the hotel buildings used to be an old lima bean elevator, which was very interesting!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are happy to hear of your experience with our staff and that you appreciated the historic side of our property. We look forward to having you back with us in the future.

Summary: It‚Äôs ok as long as you are NOT train side. Also bring your own bleach to spray the shower and toilet. Nice hotel good neighborhood Just was expecting more on the cleanliness of the bathroom and furniture was dusty
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for sharing your insight so we have the opportunity to improve you future experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Wow i must be getting lucky. This is the second time i stayed in la quinta and again a great stay. Location is perfect just off i5 and close to 405. There are 4 restaurants literally next to the hotel for convenience including fast food and more local food. Staff was nice and my room was silent. Huge room and bed closet with fridge and micro. Bathroom was large and spotless with very hot water and lots of towels. Everything in the room was new and clean with no odors. First carpet in a motel i would walk on in a long time. Didnt try the bf.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback, we greatly appreciate it! We will be happy to pass along your comments to our staff who I'm sure will be encouraged by your kind words. We look forward to having you back with us again soon.

Summary: Train, freeway and elevator. What a horrible trifecta. Old factory was converted to this so that was cool. Breakfast was mostly carbs and cold hard boiled eggs. Cold tell the front desk is weary of hearing the constant complaints for things that are beyond their control.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We hope to have you with us again, we have many locations at our property and would be very happy to show an exceptional experience.

Summary: We were picked up from the airport, and a nice guy drove us to the hotel. Check in was smooth. The first night we were right by the railroad tracks, and it was pretty bad. It drove by all night. I slept through most of it, but one time had my wife and I both sitting straight up in bed, terrified. The next night, we moved to an inside room in the silo, and we never heard the train again. We were given a ride to the Irvine Spectrum outside shopping mall, and its worth a trip. Tons of places to eat, and lots of stores, movie theater, etc. This is one of those unique hotels you won't ever forget staying at, so I'm glad we stayed here. I won't ever stay on the side of the train again, but if we are in the area again, we would stay here again as long as the price stays low. I felt it
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback! we are happy to hear your stay was enjoyable. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Unique 2 bldg property close to I-5 and Spectrum shipping center. Clean rooms. One bldg is historic be advised-its very close to Amtrak train tracks Ok breakfast , no scrambled eggs or meat though. Ive stayed at lower quality hotels that offer hot breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad you liked the Unique building and the clean, pet friendly rooms.  Your request for a hot breakfast with meats and scrambled eggs will be shared with our Corporate.  We do hope to be able to offer such breakfast at our location in the future.  We hope you will visit again in the future.

Summary Heading: It was worth it for how close to soccer field
Summary: It was ok, needs a face lift and some work but overall beds were comfy, rooms were clean. Restaurant In parking lot has great breakfast but not so great dinner knowlwood diner , don‚Äôt go the Denny‚Äôs !!!  Good area and next to soccer park where we played
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to having you back with us in the future for your next soccer game.

Summary: Fascinating hotel in old grainery that was transformed into hotel.... good location in Orange County and great value for price... spacious rooms. Friendly staff and quiet rooms. Would recommend to business and pleasure travelers
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the review of your stay.  We are so glad you were fascinated with our Historic Building.  It definitely is Unique and has a lot of character.  Thank you for the kind words.  We do hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary Heading: Great area for Irvine visit and Ok hotel.
Summary: The hotel is in a great area to visit Irvine area but is in need of modernization and improved breakfast.  We stayed in the converted warehouse building and the rooms feel bare and are in need of improvement as well as usb charging ports and more a/c outlets.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your insightful review. We are addressing your concerns actively working to better our service based on your feedback. We look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed twice there. Very nice helpful employees. The first room was a standard two bed the beds were very comfortable the room was very nice, clean and relaxing.The second room was a little noisy with being close to the ice maker and elevator and the bed was Stayed twice there very nice helpful employees the  room was a standard two bed the beds were very comfortable the room was very nice, clean and relaxing.The second room was a little noisy with being close to the ice maker and elevator and the bed was more broke in the the standards probably because it was a king but still comfortable. This one had a table and chairs which was nice.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone who loves history. I will be staying here again since it‚Äôs close to Kaiser hospital.more broke in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The rooms were clean and acceptable, but the noise from the freeway, train, and bar that shares the same parking lot, made for a restless sleep. Breakfast was poor with even worse coffee option. Thankful for the gas station, were at least there I could get a better cup of coffee, which is not saying much.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future with a room in a location more accustomed to your preferences.

Summary Heading: Average and Noisy Hotel in Irving Close to Great Park
Summary: Visiting for s lacrosse tournament we stayed at hotel. Room was ok, breakfast was less than mediocre. Hotel was the noisiest I ever stayed at. Lots of noises from train, shared parking lot and pool party going on at 2:30 AM. Several families left early and drove to San Diego rather than stay a second night.  Too many negatives associated with this property. Many better options within a 10 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear of your experience with the noise, we hope to have another opportunity in the future to provide you with an exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for a better location and terrific customer service!!!
Summary: I recently visited SoCal to catch up with old friends and had the opportunity to stay at La Quinta Irvine Spectrum.  I received a phenomenal rate and could not believe how centrally located the hotel was to the freeway, shopping, restaurants, etc.!  I had read many reviews which complained about the train noise, however, that did not hinder my stay in the slightest!  The staff was exceptionally friendly, with David going out of his way to accommodate me in checking in early as well as granting a late check-out, in addition to providing me a free upgrade to a room with a microwave and refrigerator :0)  Unfortunately, during my stay, SoCal was experiencing unusually heavy rainstorms and at one point, the room I was staying in did spring a leak.  I contacted the front desk right
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. We will be happy to pass along your comments to our front desk staff. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It's an ok stay for 1 night but I was given an upgrade and it definitely was not an upgrade. I can only imagine what the other rooms looked liked. My room smelled, the vent is right next to the bed and the air just blows in your face. The blow dryer was was burned and melted along the edge.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to leave us a detailed review. It is because of feedback like this we are able to improve for future stays with us. Your comments have been noted and passed along to our department heads, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: train tracks directly behind this hotel
Summary: this hotel somehow needs to  advertise there are train tracks directly behind this building BEFORE people decide to book a room at this place... my room was at the rear and window faced the train tracks directly and it was loud and obnoxious all night... terrible.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback! We are sorry to hear of your experience with the noise due to the train. We hope to serve you again in the future perhaps in a more fitting location for your needs, thank you.

Summary: I like La Quinta, just his branch fell below expectation on two things - hot water was not working (it's winter so brrrrrr) and the breakfast is not as good as other La Quinta's (too much carbs, no protein choices).
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback as this is how we improve our service to you. Thank you for sharing your thoughts on breakfast as well as your experience with the hot water. We hope to have you with us again in the future.

Summary: This La Quinta is literally right next to train tracks. The hotel consists of two buildings. One is a motel-style building with doors opening outside (I believe rooms in this building are numbered 100-123, 200-223, 300-323 on the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd floors, respectively). We stayed our first of two nights in a 3rd-floor room in this motel-style building, and the train noise was very loud. Traffic noise also was not ideal, but the frequent train noise was totally unacceptable. The next morning I asked if a quieter room in the other building (a unique converted grain silo) was available. We were able to move to a room on the 4th floor of that building. This building has an interior hallway with rooms on either side (numbered 124+, 224+, 324+, 424+ in this building). Our room on the
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review, your comments are much appreciated. We hope to provide you with an exceptional stay for your next visit.

Summary: The conveyance and friendliness of the staff makes this one of the best places to stay when travelling.  I prefer to stay here on both business and personal travel plans.  Going green is another big plus for me since we need to be aware and of how we are leaving this planet to those that come after us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! Your comments have been shared with the staff and appreciated. We hope to have you back with us soon.

Summary: Customer service was exceptional. Their website makes it seem that the entire hotel has been remodeled however it is the back end which has been converted and new.  We had booked 8 rooms and were put in the rooms up front. These reminded me of a motel 6. They were very nice and helpful but the rooms were not what I expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property, your response has been noted. We hope to provide you with an exceptional stay for your next visit to Irvine.

Summary Heading: An affordable, no-frills place centrally located
Summary: The rooms are a bit loud, since the hotel is right next to the airport.  It's typical for 'doors open to the outside" arrangements.  The room was very clean; the breakfast was not atypically bad, but not motivating to eat.  The staff wasn't overwhelming friendly or helpful, but completely polite.  It's not out of the ordinary, other than it did deliver on cleanliness and comfort of the bed.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you back with us for an exceptional stay!

Summary Heading: Out of dog waste bag for 4 days
Summary: This is our favorite hotel when we visit huntington dog beach with our two large dogs. Most of time their services were good and we were happy with two large dogs. We visited on Jan 1st 2019 and found dog waste bags were out. We asked front desk to fill it at 9pm but the lady said it will fill in the morning. Next morning, it was not filled. We asked front desk again on Jan 2nd. They said they will fill, it never filled until our leaving on Jan 4th. Something wrong with managements on our stay from jan 1st to Jan 4th 2019. They definitely need improvements.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed review! Our apologies for your experience with the dog waste bags. This of course is not our standard and look forward to showing you a truly exceptional stay in the future.

Summary: We love staying here, it's always clean and the customer service is always great!  It's located in the old Irvine district, it is next to a Metrolink but that's not to bad.  There's a Denny's, Jack in the Box and Knollwoods within walking distances.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear of your time with us! Thank you for your wonderful review, we will be happy to pass it along to our staff. We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary Heading: Misleading photos - dumpy old building - sub-par
Summary: I've stayed in a bunch of La Quintas and I can confidently say that this was the worst one I've been in. I booked this hotel based largely on the photos and the location. The photos appear to be of more modern rooms, well appointed and classy. Reality is that most of the rooms are outdoor entrance like Motel 6 and in dire need of an update. The bed in room 302 was like a hammock it was so broken down. I had to climb under the desk to get to a plug to for my computer. There is a severe lack of plugs in this place. The tub kept dripping. The paint is peeling in the bathroom. As for the hotel itself, every other LQ I've stayed at has had a nice little market where I could get a snack and some various toiletries. Not this one. They lock the lobby off from the guests around midnight.
Manager Response: We received your review and are sorry you were not happy with your stay.  Our location is older. It is on the Nation Register of Historic Places.  Our property has both interior and exterior access rooms.  The majority of our rooms are interior corridor located in the "Silo" building.  Like many properties, our exterior doors lock overnight requiring registered guests to swipe their key to access the building.  We apologize if you were having difficulties.  We do hope to receive some upgrades and renovations in the near future.  Most of the renovations do include the addition of the Bright Side Market in the lobby and increased number of outlets in the room to name a few.  Your review will be shared with our staff and our Supervisors.  We will use your comments to improve.

Summary Heading: Ask to Stay in the Warehouse
Summary: I recently stayed at this La Quinta property for the second time and it was subpar. We had to move from our first room in the second floor of the main building because the fire alarm was chirping for a battery change but they did not have any maintenance personnel to resolve the issue. It was changing the battery but I understand there is protocol. However, I was glad to change because the room was dingy and dirty with a massive stain along one of the beds. However, when we went to our double bed on the third floor the carpets were just as dingy and the shower was heavily stained.   I was disappointed with this experience because a couple months ago I stayed in the old warehouse double bed room and it was AMAZING. It was clean, spacious and unique. I really enjoyed the stay.   I
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We do apologize for the problems you experienced with the chirping smoke detector and having to switch rooms.  There is no excuse for a dirty room.  We will share your review with our entire team so we can improve or cleaning processes.  We do hope to get some renovations in the coming year.

Summary: Great room at a great price! It worked well for handicap wheelchair access and bathroom handles for my mother which were not available in the previous hotel we stayed at.Really made traveling with her much easier!
Manager Response: We are glad you had a good experience, we try to make it the best one every time. We hope to see you next time.

Summary: Staff at front counter is very arrogant and rude! Manager wasn't any better. No desire to seek customer satisfaction. A towel was taken from my nephew's baggage and was not returned or no sorry of attempt to make the situation right. Reality is it's not the cost but the principal!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your concerns.  We apologize that you had a bad experience at our location and our staff was not able to assist.  This is not the experience we want our guests to have. Guest satisfaction and integrity are very important to us and I can assure you this will be discussed and addressed immediately with the entire Team.

Summary Heading: Stayed in the cement reclaimed building
Summary: We have not stayed here in the past due to the nearby train tracks.  We loved the reclaimed cement building.  Our room was 233.  It was so quiet, we never heard the train.  The bed was comfortable, room was clean.  Location is great.  Ask to stay in the silo building.  Ronnie at the front desk was very helpful.

Summary Heading: Love this space and you will too
Summary: I love this La Quinta as its in an old reclaimed building with a lot of character, a great dining room and a beautiful pool  -- with access to all things in Costa Mesa, Irvine and Laguna.  One of the best La Quinta's I have ever stayed in- and FYI, La Quinta, is Spanish for "next to Denny's"
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed your overall stay. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We found the property to be about what we expected.  The breakfast was pretty mediocre, but the staff were exceptionally friendly. The beds were marginally comfortable, the bathroom small, the train ran nearby the property- but again friendly staff by themselves lifted our rating from 3 stars to 4 stars- especially 20-year-old Jacquie.
Manager Response: Thank you for you feedback! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay overall. Your comments are helpful, and we will take them into account when planning breakfast upgrades. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel room carpet has lots of stains, the price is very high compared to the value you‚Äôre getting.
Summary: Hotel room carpet has lots of stains, the price is very high compared to the value you‚Äôre getting. It‚Äôs probably more expensive than some of the 3 stars hotels in the area that a little bit further than spectrum.
Manager Response: I am sorry that the condition of your room wasn't up to our usual standards. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: The was my third stay at this property. The last time (July 2018) I reported the treadmill in the gym was not  working. I just returned in September 2018 the treadmill two treadmill is still broken. I should get a refund for my stay since the gym equipment is part of the amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share your experience here with us. We are getting a new one but it hasn't been delivered. We had put this for immediate attention. We hope this experience won't keep you from trying our hotel again.

Summary: we love the history of this La Quinta in old Irvine trying to stay in the unique rooms offered in the silo & have stayed here many times with and without our family pet. When there we are able to visit family and see many attractions close by
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon. Your comments are very much appreciated.

Summary Heading: Another stay - another room - "iffy" about returning again
Summary: This is not my first visit with this hotel.  Over the course of a few years I have learned to know that there are good rooms and poor rooms.  If you can stay in rooms 335 & 3331.  Among the best maintained but still lacking and showing wear and tear and the owners lack of attention to details.  The hotel exterior is run down - perhaps a reflection of the area decline for the center it is in which also is worn down. Inside you can see patchwork repairs to ceilings that leak in the rain and fixes/patches on walls.  At least the hotel and the rooms do not have any moldy/musty odors and the beds and linens area clean, fresh and fairly new and of fairly good quality.  I visit this area on a regular basis to see my kids - other hotels with similar pricing have better maintained
Manager Response: We received your review and apologize you were not happy.  We appreciate the feedback.  We are working with the Old Town Irvine and the association to get approval for some upgrades.  Your comments and review have been shared with our Staff so we can address and improve.  We do hope to undergo some interior and room renovations in the coming year.  Thank you.

Summary: Great experience! I will be back again when I can. I loved the close proximity of restaurants and services. The staff was helpful and accommodating! The hotel was well appointed and comfortable. I'll be back!!!!
Manager Response: We received your review and are happy you had a Great experience and will be back.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Irvine.

Summary: It is always great to return to a La Quinta Hotel. They always have a nice, clean hotel with staff that makes you feel at home AND pets are welcome! The locations always seem to be good and it is the only place where I eat waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  We are so glad you and your pets felt Welcome!  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Irvine.

Summary: We stayed for my granddaughter‚Äôs birthday party. We had a couple of rooms a Dan they were able to keep us together though we check in at very different times, but called ahead. Wonderful service, clean and comfortable rooms, love the train side of the Silo!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review and comments from your recent stay.  We are so glad you had a great time for your Granddaughter's Birthday.  I hope her day was truly special.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: I have stayed @ this Location a few times... now a rewards member.  Great location near Hoag Hospital & The Irvine Spectrum.  There is a Shuttle for Orange County/ John Wayne Airport.  Continental Breakfast is nice in the morning 6:00am to 9:00am.  The Front Desk Staff is very accommodating- ESPECIALLY Jacqueline.  Price is VERY Fair..... especially for the location.  Refrigerator & Microwave in most rooms.  Try to get away from ‚ÄúThe Train Side‚Äù.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Hotel is OK, there is really a need for a better breakfast.  Pool is OK, but rooms and the hallways can be improved. I asked for a late checkout until 3:30 PM after a three days stay, but the staff could not accommodate this. I will most likely stay at another hotel next time!
Manager Response: So sorry that we could not accommodate a 3:30 checkout. We are sorry that your experience was less than perfect. We do wish you would give us another opportunely.

Summary: loved it. was a new locatio n for mr. got a great value i thought on the room. would defiantly go back. i was most impressed by the room itself and cleaniness. ill look into future event s in irvien after staying at this location
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The cleanliness of the entire hotel was unsatisfactory according to the price. It is depressing to see on the web nice rooms and plus and when you get there is a entire surprise. The carpets in the room were old and dirty. The sheets had stains on it, one of the mattress was really beat up, gum on furniture, bathroom rub was alse really old, one of the sprinlkers was sticking out and room had a weird smell to it. I have pictures for verification
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that your experience was anything less than perfect. I have shared your comments with my team. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts.

Summary: I went to Irvine due to my job, I had a good experience with the exception that the exercise equipment was out of service and I wanted to continue excising, but I did some laps at the swimming pool and got it over with. I started to exercise due to health issues and did not want to stop. but everything else is great at this hotel! will stay again if need to!!

Summary Heading: Different but some rooms next to RR tracks
Summary: We were only needing a place to sleep for the night so we didnt want to spend a lot of money. The room was great for the price. The staff was just there to do their job and weren't particularly friendly but weren't bad. The building and walls were all cement, its a different look some may not like but we had no problem with it. The room was literally feet away from the railroad tracks and trains, very LOUD trains passed every now and then. It didnt bother us but if you're sensitive to things like that then request a room in another area. The room was clean and we didnt stay long to really have an opinion on much else inside the room. The area in the attached parking lot was quaint with small businesses and it felt unique. We arrived at night and left early morning so I would go

The hotel is right next to the train track so it is a bit noisy in the early morning. Spacious room but carpet is old, especially in the stair case from guest rooms to lobby. Good value for a hotel in Irvine if you don't mind the train noise in the morning.
Manager Response: We received the review from your stay.  We appreciate your comments and will address the carpets.  Your feedback will help us improve our operations.  Thank you.

Summary: Spent a Mother-Daughter Weekend together due to soccer tournament nearby.  Accommodations were wonderful! Great room! However, the breakfast situation was unpleasant.  They wouldn't allow her to take the foods to our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Mother-Daughter weekend and soccer tournament.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We apologize for the unpleasant breakfast situation you described.  We will be addressing this with our staff so we can prevent this from happening again.  We do hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Irvine
Summary: We were flying in and out of John Wayne airport for a family reunion and stayed the night before our departure.  Loved the historic building!  Good job with the decorating of an unusual space and the room was spacious and very clean.  Don't travel to SoCa much but if we did and we were in Irvine we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your recent stay.  We are so glad  you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Irvine.

Summary: The first night I was assigned a double bed room in the old building, even though I was on my own.  The noise from the highway was so loud I couldn't sleep, in the morning I went down and asked for another room, the service was great, I was assigned different room in another building but unfortunately still facing the highway.  I barely slept through the stay and was exhausted by the end

I needed to be out of my home for 2 days during termite fumigation. This is the second time I stayed at La Quinta with my 2 dogs. I love this pet friendly place and would not stay anywhere else. Everyone is warm and friendly and the rooms are big and comfortable. And the cost to stay there was lower than other places in the surrounding area. Thank you, La Quinta for a great stay.

Was really surprised by the warehouse converted hotel building, with irregular shape rooms/hallway, raw cemented wall.  It is really strange when you were there during the day time without light. Even though the hotel personnel is so nice to move me to the regular main building.  The strange feeling stays even.  The AC is old style, on and off every few minutes with wind direction toward the bed which disturbing the sleep.
Manager Response: We are so happy that we could accommodate you to the main building. We try to help and make our guest number one. We hope to see you on your next vist

Summary: Would anyone like to stay in a dungeon? Come to La Quinta Irvine. Irvine, CA?! Concrete walls, year 1901 carpet with numerous stains. Believed to be spiderweb at foot of bed. Why is this hotel in existence in this nice suburban area..I'm confused. I walked in.. pondered for 15 mins like, is this real, and left..they could keep their beyond overpriced money. Not to mention the loud train I heard pass twice within the 15mins I was there. Officially worse La Quinta in the state of CA..maybe America. Sorry, please demolish and renovate. Immediately.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that your experience was anything less tan perfect. I have shared your comments with my team. Your feedback is very much appreciated.

Summary: As of my visit in August of 2018; the rooms at this inn are outdated. The furniture is old, carpet is old as are the features. Additionally, if you get a room that faces the railroad track ‚Äî don‚Äôt expect to rest. The train runs all day; stops at midnight and then starts again at 3am. Rumbles the entire room, bed, everything. One positive thing is the staff is courteous and I appreciated the airport shuttle.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not get a restful night's sleep. We are glad that our staff was courteous and helpful. We hope you will give us another chance.

Summary Heading: Trains and rooms in general disrepair ‚Äî there are better choices
Summary: I stayed at this property last week, booking earlier in the day for that evening so I wouldn't have to commute 100 miles home. Upon arrival, I was given a "train side" room ‚Äî little did I know that was a dire warning.  The fourth floor room was in terrible condition, with stains, paint flaking, and broken pieces of furniture. The air was musty, too (the window, with a broken frame, didn't open).   A major north/south rail line is literally outside the window, with 100-ton trains zooming by on a regular basis. They are loud ‚Äî especially when they blow their horns.  This was my first time trying La Quinta in Irvine, and the experience at this property was terrible. There are much better choices in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the time you‚Äôve taken to provide such constructive feedback regarding your experience.  We are very sorry to hear of the unsatisfactory aspects of your stay.  This information has been forwarded to our Management Team to ensure improvements are considered and made.  We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: The  cleanliness  of the room was horrible the sink has an inner ring of mold and the tub had hair and an old piece of soap bar. it seem like they didn‚Äôt even check the room because there was still clothes in the drawer. Then to top it off the occupants next to us were smoking marijuana.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for shows at Fivepoint
Summary: My wife and I stayed here when we were in town for a Dirty Heads show in June.  We had a train side room, but had no problems sleeping.  It's a great location for a concert at fivepoints and there are some options for food within walking distance.

A very good hotel for the price. It is not expected to be a high end hotel but is very comfortable and has all the amenities that a person would need. The bed was comfortable. The breakfast was a light breakfast and good for this style of hotel. Hotel is very convenient to freeway. Nice and helpful staff.

I was visiting on a business trip last minute.  An associate of mine booked the room for me.  The location of the hotel was very close to work.  The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel to my associates.

Summary Heading: Don't take a room on 'train side'
Summary: Literally, the Amtrak trains whiz by at all times of the day or night and the track is literally feet from the other side of the window.  I would recommend not taking a 'train side' room.  The breakfast options are exactly the same from one day to the next.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay went.  We do apologies for the train next door.  You made a good suggestion for next time requesting a non-train side room.  We do offer breakfast every morning from 6am to 9am on weekdays and from 7am to 10am on weekends.  It consists of Waffles, Muffins, Toast, Bagels, Oatmeal, Coffee, Tea, Coco, Apple and Orange Juice, Cereal, Milk, Yogurt, and Fruit.  It is a large selection that you can choose from.  My apologies that we did not have an item that you would have liked.  Thank you again for sharing and giving us a review.

Summary: I am exhausted, having been yanked out of sleep by a train five feet from my window three times now.  Thought I might be able to sleep through it, but so far no luck.  I had no warning of this and no option to change rooms until tomorrow.  The building is also pretty unsecured and not part of the main hotel.  Overall, big disappointment.
Manager Response: We received the review of your stay and apologize for the noise from the passing trains. We are sorry you were not happy.  We try our best to offer upgrade to a quieter location when it is available.  Thank you for sharing your comments.

Summary: Room too small. No closet to han my suits. There was a small area in the bathroom....yes, the bathroom between the toilet and shower to hang your clothing. Also, a high speed train goes by the building often, and all day and night. It will scare the crap out of you and you won‚Äôt get much rest. Room 324 to be exact.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your stay.  We are sorry you were not happy with the layout of the room and the proximity to the train.  Your comments will be shared with our Team so we can improve.

Summary: I really liked it here.  The location just of the freeway and three places to eat within walking distance and a convenience mart/gas station across the street make this a very comfortable and easy place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay.  We are so glad you liked it.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: If they try and put you up in Room 326....Run! It is literally on top of the train track, and is very loud. Ever seen My Cousin Vinny? Staff is decent, location is ok, but the noise of the train, and the construction does not make it a desirable place to stay.

Hotel is a converted grain silo.  Soooo coool!  My son and I were in town for a sporting event.  The hotel is just a few miles from shopping, great restaurants, and entertainment.  The staff is friendly and always there ready to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review!  We are so happy you liked the Silo and enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you and your son again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: Good location near 405 and 5 interchange and the Irvine Spectrum, but property needs to be upgraded. Chipping point, poor lighting, funky bathrooms.  Good value, but poor experience. By the way, do not waste your time on the donut and instant coffee breakfast.

The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The pool was large and relaxing. The location and the history of the hotel was unique. The rooms were clean. I would stay at this hotel again. All my expectations were met.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the review of your recent stay.  We are glad you enjoyed the accommodations.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: 2 dogs barking next door for 3 hours and guest services did nothing. I finally left at 11 pm when we couldn‚Äôt sleep and found another hotel.  I still have not received a credit on my credit card.  They also hand out ear plugs that did not work for a local freight train.  We slept through that the first night.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay was not what you expected due to the noise on the trains and dogs. We should have handled the barking dogs immediately. We have shared this with our staff so we can better respond to our guests in the future.  Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: Rustic setting.  A/C units in room which was great, didn't have to turn it on.  I prefer fresh air through open window.  Very friendly and professional staff.  My two puppies and I had a pleasant stay and a good night's rest.  Nice dog walk area.

Summary Heading: My room is right by the railway
Summary: I got room right by the railway (very close), there is  train runs by every few hours, very loud, I was not able to sleep at all.I request to change room, they told me this is the only room available, not able to switch room. Room such as mine should not rent out as a hotel room at all. My wakeup call didn't occur, printer is done not able to print. I checked out my room as soon as possible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the review of your recent stay.  We do apologize for the noise you experienced from the passing trains and our inability to switch your room to a non-train side.  We have shared your comments with the staff and we will coach the staff on service and wake up calls.  We will continue to work on better sound proofing the rooms in the Historic Silo building.

Summary: Stayed two nights for a lacrosse tournament at very nearby OC sports complex.  We were given a room on the train track side of the annex (converted factory) building.  At check-in, the front desk was kind enough to warn us about the trains, but was not able to do anything else because the hotel was to capacity.  If you are a light sleeper, I'd avoid this hotel.  The trains are very loud and run late into the night.  Some cause the entire room to shake.    I booked through booking.com, and paid considerably more per night than the advertised rate at check in.  The front desk adjusted my rate to match the discount -- very much appreciated!  The breakfast was very average but good enough.  The facilities are ok - just a bit dated.  Staff were very friendly.  Coin-operated washer
Manager Response: We are happy our location was conveniently located near the Sports complex for your lacrosse tournament.  We do apologize for the noise you experienced from the train.  We are working with our Corporation as well as the Historical Society on ways to better block the noise from the trains.  We hope to see you on your next trip to Irvine. Thank you.

Summary: We find LaQuinta Hotels a great value plus they allow us to bring our 2 Golden Retrievers, so, when we drive coast to coast each summer to see 4 of our kids, that's our usual hotel choice. One LQ we'll never see again is the Irvine Spectrum, not because of the facilities or stay, but, because of treatment we received by a manager after we checked out.  My wife left her hyper allergenic pillow when we checked out. It was pretty expensive, but, more important, crucial to her sleep quality. My wife called 3 times, explaining the problem to the person that answered, was told to hang on while they checked with housekeeping. All 3 times resulted in hold times exceeding 20 minutes, the last 2, she gave them her phone #, should they get disconnected, yet, no call back. She finally got
Manager Response: We are so sorry that your experience was anything less than perfect. We strive to give the best customer service to every guest. It seems that we fell short during your stay. I have used your comments as an opportunity to review our service standards with staff. Your feedback is very much appreciated

Summary: Great place! Pet friendly as well. Definitely coming back when we're in the area. Overall the rooms were clean and well kept. Family enjoyed the stay at La Quinta Suites in Irvine. Close to the Spectrum too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words.  We are happy to enjoyed it!

Summary: We stayed here for one night and were happy with our stay.  The rooms are clean and we really appreciated the fact that they allow pets.  We had our dog with us.  I would definitely stay here again.   It is close to the freeway and close to irvine spectrum where there are good restaurants and shopping available.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and our location worked well for you.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Current construction and not being familiar with the area made finding the entrance to the hotel a bit challenging. Check-in was smooth, our room was located in the renovated cannery that is perpendicular to the hotel. As you enter the cannery annex, there is a lovely pool and a very industrial looking sitting area. You can still see various aspects of the once functional cannery, like cement walls, and exposed electrical outlets if you like that sort of setting. What I did not need to see is an open door containing various custodial items. Our room was located on the 2nd floor. I saw the cannery look was still going on in the hallways. Our room proved to also carry on the cement/metal look on its walls and revealed a very unattractive color scheme and decor. The exposed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We value your comments.  We apologize for the difficulties you experienced finding our location with the construction down the street.  We are glad the location worked well for you.  We do hope to get some upgrades and fresher look in the future.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and Affordable in South Irvine
Summary: Nice hotel at a decent price in Irvine.  Beds and showers are awesome.  Rooms are good sized so you don't feel cramped.  Breakfast is an actual breakfast - cereal & milk, breakfast breads, waffles, hard boiled eggs, juice, etc., though not a hot breakfast other than the waffles.  Not the Four Seasons, but a comfortable spot.   Didn't hear a lot of noise from the neighbors, though there is a little freeway sounds, but did not keep this light sleeper awake.  Staff is friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  We appreciate it.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: They booked me a room facing the railroad and every 10 minutes you wake up with horrible noise. They should pay people to stay in this hotel instead of charging money. It was the worst hotel experience ever.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that you didn't get a restful night sleep. On you next visit, be sure to request one of our quieter rooms.

Summary Heading: Cops everywhere at all times day and night
Summary: This hotel is a non smoking hotel so you have to go outside to smoke and I went and sat out in my car to smoke and had two cops rush up on me and put me in hand cuffs for no reason other than me smoking a cigarette in my car
Manager Response: We are so sorry, and understand how unpleasant this was for you. Thank you for your comments. We are truly sorry for the inconvenience. I appreciate your understanding.

Summary: Pleasantly surprised by spotless bathroom. Could offer quality bath products. Room was clean with exception of dusty light bulbs, sticky remote and phone. Fridge freezer over freezes leaving water dripping in fridge.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  Your comments will help us improve.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I loved the room. It made me feel like I was staying in a room designed to provide an aesthetic impression.  When I stay at lesser expensive places, there is a noticeable difference. In the end I guess it is true: you get what you pay for in life.  I was thoroughly pleased with my visit at La Quinta!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: It's really horrible experience staying in the hotel room feeling just like sleeping on the railway.  The reception staff should let us know the condition.  Unfortunately it became the poorest experience of our family trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the feedback from your stay.  We apologize you were unhappy with the location of our property next to the railway.  We are working with our Corporate on ways to reduce some of the noise from the trains.  We appreciate you taking the time to review.

Summary: This is a very unique La Quinta Hotel and is a pleasure to stay there.  My room was upgraded to an Executive King and was very large and comfortable in the Silo Building.  This hotel is an Historic Site and is convenient to a lot of attractions. I live staying here and will stay again when I am in California.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the review from your stay.  We appreciate your loyalty and are glad you enjoy the Historic Silo Building.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed in stone portion of Hotel, very cool and modern. Super clean...Great burger joint just across parking lot...Definitely will be back for future concerts at Fivepoint amphitheater..  Lyft was only about $7
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are glad our location worked well for you while  you attended your event.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The bathroom smelled horrible. The ceiling fan with full of dirt in the bathroom.  There is a train track right behind the hotel and the train runs every 30 minutes. The hotel is old and needs updating
Manager Response: We received your review and apologize for the problems you experienced with the cleanliness of your room and the proximity of our location to the train.  We have shared your comments with our Team so we can improve.  We hope to have the opportunity to better accommodate you in the future.  Thank you.

Summary: Excellent Management and Service.  Close to the Great Park Irvine where we held our event, The Great Irish Fair. Will use this facility on our next Fair in the year 2018 because of its proximity and and the professionalism of the management and the staff, and the cleanliness of the Inn in general.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the kind words.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are looking forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: I liked the old historic feel of the hotel. Though, it was bit noise when trains zipped by otherwise quiet. It was good location as I was there for a fair at Great Park Irvine. Nice location with many food choices, near freeway, and nice pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments of your recent stay.  We are glad our location was close to the Irish Fair you attended at the Great Park.  We understand the noise from the trains can be loud.  We are working with our Corporate office to better soundproof the area.  We hope to see you again next year.

Summary: Centrally located, easy access to John Wayne Airport and the Irvine Mall. Plenty of shaded parking, hot tub and swimming pool...We like and enjoy staying there. I don't like to be forced to use 200 characters, I said what I had to say in 160 characters. Establishing a minimum voids my experience.
Manager Response: We received the review from your recent stay.  We are glad our location was comfortable at a fair price with easy access to the airport.  I appreciate the feedback.  Thank you.

Summary: Time for a facelift and some coaching of the staff. We usually overlook a lot because of your generous pet policy but between the broken microwave and fridge, dirty common areas and elevators, a substandard breakfast buffet. Lightweight utensils.... Really??? A desk clerk that not only did not ask about our stay at checkout, also neglected to say thank you.  Been a big advocate of LQ Inns & Suites but they should be ashamed of this property.

Was fine for my quick stay.  I asked for a room away from freeway noise.  Got a room at the bottom of the staircase.  People talking going up/down at all hours, kind of defeated the purpose of my needing as little noise as possible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of our property.  It was great to have you here even thought it was as you said a quick stay.  My apologies for the noise you experienced during your stay.  Next time you are in the area we can put you away from the stairwell and non train side.  We look forward to your return and we thank you again for your feedback.  It is through comments as yours that help us improve.

Summary: Nothing fancy, Just nice clean, comfortable accommodations.Several cuts above Motel 6 and the like.Capable, attentive staff. Honored request for room easily available for handicap guest. Best qualify for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the comments from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback.  We hope you will choose La Quinta Inn and Suites Irvine-Spectrum on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Although their service is wonderful, they casually mentioned that my room was next to a train. I didn‚Äôt think it would be THAT bad, but my room was literally 10 feet from a train track. It was TERRIDYING the noise it made and happened a few times an hour. It sounded like someone screaming and shook the building.    Although I see how they wanted to make the building ‚Äúhistorical‚Äù you‚Äôre literally staying in a cement building which has creepy vibes. Not a place I would recommend to stay if you have to stay in the historical building. I would have never stayed here if I would have known.   Friendly people though!
Manager Response: We received the review from your recent stay.  We apologize for the problems you experienced with the noise and overall feeling of the Silo building.  We will definitely pass your comments along to our Corporate Office.  Thank you!

Summary: Really good location for 5 points concerts! Breakfast and 2 restaurants right across parking lot. Comfortable beds, and decent breakfast. If you need a clean comfortable room , with a refrigerator and microwave, bank on this one .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay.  We are glad we were a good fit.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary Heading: This is a budget hotel with nothing fancy about it
Summary: I stayed here for a week-long business trip, so I believe I got the full experience.  Overall the hotel is fine. The mattress was very comfortable and the bedding was bright and clean and very comfortable to sleep in, and since this was a business trip for me, that's the most important aspect of a hotel for me.  The second most important aspect on business trips in my opinion is the breakfast. The options here were limited and not fancy by any stretch of the imagination, but everything tasted good and I didn't go to work hungry, so that's all that matters.  The section of the hotel I was in is essential a multi-story motel (the hotel has two buildings). You enter your room right from the outdoors and can park right in front of your window if you like. I was on the ground floor
Manager Response: We received the review of your stay.  We appreciate the feedback and apologize for the problems you experienced with the odor of smoke, dirty carpet, noise from outside and the USB outlets in the room.  We have shared your review with our Team and we will address these areas.  Your comments will help us improve.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Low price and a bit run down
Summary: I was looking for a cheap hotel and this is one. The property isn't that well maintained but it seems quite safe. One side faces railroad tracks which are active at all hours. The bathroom and carpet were dirty on arrival, the A/C was cold but the fan didn't push much air--overall a passable experience if you're just looking for cheap.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We strive to offer value without sacrificing quality and it appears that we dropped the ball during your stay. Rest assured your feedback will help us improve our operation.

Summary Heading: Do NOT stay here , unless you like prison
Summary: After a long day of traveling and work I show up at this hotel. My exceptions weren‚Äôt high as I realize this is La Quinta Inn and not the 4 seasons. However, I got to my room and entered the bathroom which was full of water. Mopped it up with towels and realized the ceiling was leaking. Grabbed my belongings and went to the front desk and asked if I could change rooms and they were accommodating. They asked if I would be ok with concrete walls.. and I jokingly said ‚Äúas long as there‚Äôs a window, I‚Äôm sure I will be fine‚Äù   Walk into my new room and WTF! I was expecting some concrete walls as a new modern room design. NO! This is like a sleeping in a cellar and smells of musty mold. I love how they say it‚Äôs ‚Äúa historical building‚Äù  I‚Äôm sure this is just a way to add more rooms
Manager Response: We apologized for the experience that you had during your stay. We will use your feedback to improve our operation. Thank you for your time.

Summary: The Metro runs right behind the building...I mean RIGHT behind! The track is about 10 feet away from your window and you hear every single train that goes by. Good luck if you get stuck on that side of the building and you had planned on getting some sleep!
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We do try to upgrade everyone away from the train-side when occupancy allows.

Summary: Stayed here with my family. Great location (5 minutes from Irvine spectrum shopping/pretend city). Clean facility, nothing special. Did have free breakfast (cereal, waffles, toast, coffee, juice). Our room was in the silo portion of the hotel which was an interesting touch. Has a nice outdoor pool but is not heated in the cooler months
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: Don't bother staying here. Rooms in need of renovation. We stayed here as spouse had surgery @ Hoag. Had to change rooms to maybe decrease chance of post op infection. I had arranged to change rooms the night before but  they couldn't seem to find that. Finally they conceded. It is close to freeways. Didn't try breakfast considering the state of the room.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We will use your feedback to improve our operation moving forward.

Summary Heading: Dont expect to find the laundry or sleep during the multiple trains passing
Summary: With zero signs pointing you in the right direction, dont expect to find the laundry room.  They dont sell soap either so if you happen to find it, the hotel assumes you brought your own.  If you are in the 2nd building, assume you will be woken up many times per night by the roar of freight trains.  12 times to be exact.  Never again La Quinta...
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We have attempted to reach you by phone. Please give us a call, so we can further discuss the situation. Thank you for your time.

Summary: The back half of the hotel is within 20 feet of a railroad track that has frequent trains flying past. To say it‚Äôs noisy is an extreme understatement. It is by far the noisiest hotel I‚Äôve ever stayed in and working in the airline industry for 35 years I‚Äôve stayed in thousands of hotels. If you value a good night‚Äôs sleep choose another hotel.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced during your stay. Rest assured we are looking into ways to minimize the noise. We hope you will provide us another opportunity to make things right.

Summary Heading: Pee under the sheets on one of the beds. we didnt see it.
Summary: So the purpose of this review is just to warn everyone about checking your room before you actually use it. In this case make sure the beds are really clean under and over. We called the front desk but it was already 2:30 a.m. and we just checked in. We were not surprised if he was the only one there at that time of the day. They refunded 100% of the cost of our one night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your concerns to our Housekeeping department to ensure our rooms are being cleaned to our high standards.

Summary: Assistant General manager MR.Lee was a nightmare to deal with..Very un-accomadating..we were working at a job that had big dead line..did not need stress that we had to deal with at La Quinta..Personally will never stay there again ..nor will any of my workers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience that you experienced during your stay.

Summary: One of the most overpriced and dirtiest hotels I've ever stayed at I've stayed at way nicer hotel sixes this will be the 1st and last la Quinta inn I stay at. 130 dollars for a junk room. The light went out in the bathroom and there was hair on the floors and we would risk walking bare foot.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We will share your comments with our Housekeeping team to ensure our rooms are being cleaned to our high standards.

Summary: Very unique rooms in the south "renovated" building.  I thought it was awesome, and enjoyed the building very much.  Even the train at 2:00 am is a great experience.  Rooms were clean, and staff was great.  Did not use internet or Wifi.  Breakfast convenient, but needs more choices.  Parking is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will take your suggestion into consideration when looking into adding more breakfast options.

Summary: This was a quaint, historical site with a complimentary breakfast and a large dining area.  The surprise was when they gave me earplugs for  the train that runs next to one of the two buildings.  I suggest that guests inquire which building and how close to the train they will be staying.

I have stayed at this property several times and will stay many more as family lives 2 miles away. Reservation was easy and everybody was courteous and my needs were met. The breakfast was very good and more than enough to eat. Parking was also great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your compliments to our team.

Summary: Large room, very clean.  Could have used an additional comfortable chair and a table, but there was a desk chair and one recliner.  Hotel staff upgraded our room prior to check-in to include a microwave and refrigerator at no additional cost, which was nice.  Wish the desk clerk could have better described the part of the hotel that was a converted grainary.  We stayed 3 nights and probably would have preferred staying in that building, but stayed in the conventional hotel because it was closer to where we had parked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will advise our desk clerks to describe our hotel better.

Summary: The staff is friendly and accommodating. The amenities, while a bit worn, are very clean and well maintained. The price is excellent for the location and the shuttle service a wonderful bonus. I plan to return often to the Irvine La Quinta.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you made good use of our free shuttle service.

Summary Heading: Horrible - dirty - run down - Not worth considering
Summary: OK - I spend 40-50 nights a year in hotels ranging at all ends of the spectrum - from cheap to  very exclusive - THIS is the worst place I have stayed in 15 years regardless of level.  Stayed 4/6/18 to 4/10/18. Booked through HOTWIRE (they lost a customer from this as well)  so 100% PREPAID - Check -in - they ask for a deposit for incidentals equal to my entire stays cost (most ask for $50-150 - so know I have paid in full 2X in  advance ( yes major credit card)),  Place is OLD and run down ( see pics I posted) - We were in the ols hotel - not the historic section.  Day 1: Breakfast - way too basic - ZERO meat available - eggs were mass produced hard-boiled,  As my wife and daughter waited downstairs for me (rooms face the exterior open to the outside) a female individual drove
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced during both of your stays at La Quinta. We will use your feedback to improve our operation. Thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: The hotel building is too old.
Summary: The building is too old. It's better to tear down the building and build a new one. The building structure and layout look so weird. The location is convenient by the highway 5 and close to Irvine spectrum as well.

The train tracks were about 30 feet from our bedroom window. The trains came all night. The place used to be a grainery, ugly, unfinished concrete walls with raw cuts into the concrete for the doors windows etc. bright lights shine in under the doors. Floors slope.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We will look into adding better door sweeps to keep light out of the rooms.

Summary: This concrete landscape which is located between train road and car route 5 gives sad memories. Breakfast mostly from sugar. From meat only boiled eggs. Waffles are pretty good. Coffee is every poor. Jacuzzi is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look into supplementing our breakfast options to better suit guests' needs.

Summary: We did not receive the 7 day contract until the end of the stay therefore did not know about the 2 day housekeeping visit, which was too late to chose by then anyway. Although the front desk said we technically were eligible to receive it every day had we wanted for whatever reason, which we did not get despite being out of the room by 9 am most days and no DnD sign in the door so we had to get our own linens. When I did sign the 7 day contract I asked for a copy and got the excuse that you had no toner to make copies.  Our room keys got disabled 3 times within the first few days and were only given vague ideas as to why it kept happening.  Our fridge broke that we paid extra for and never got anyone out to fix it, only more excuses as to how busy the maintenance staff was and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will use your feedback as a coaching opportunity to improve our customer service.

Summary: If you are beyond the traditional hotel room (although you can find that, too, here) we enjoyed staying in the section the La Quinta folks call, The Silo. It is a separate building, which used to be a Grain and Feed transfer and storage building along the railroad tracks, adjacent to the main hotel. It's Industrial style rooms (of poured concrete) on the first and second floors in this building (I don't know if they use the upper floors.) There is a separate lounge area in this building with historical pictures of lining the walls, adjacent to a lovely swimming pool.We were traveling with our small dog, so we asked for a ground floor room on the South side, away from the railroad tracks. Our Double Double + SofaBed room was quite large and very clean. If you like soft
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of our property. We will take into consideration your suggestion to replace our bulbs with a warmer color.

Summary Heading: Pillow cases smelt like sweat and hadn't been changed
Summary: Room was overall in good condition, but the pillow cases smelt like someone just sweated all over them.  When I tried to reach the front desk, at 11:00 pm I couldn't get any action.  Next morning I went to write a note and the pen tip was melted.  First real bad experience with La Quinta and I am a Premier Member.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay. We will forward your concerns to our housekeeping department to ensure we are maintaining our room to the highest standards.

Summary Heading: Hotel was fine -- good enough for the price -- nothing particularly special
Summary: Visited Monrovia to see friends.  Hotel was fine. A little tricky to find the driveway entrance. Bed was lumpy and uncomfortable. Breakfast was good.  Wi Fi was slow. Hotel was quiet and felt safe. Good enough for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are in the process of replacing all worn mattresses and addressing Wi-Fi speeds. We apologize for any inconvenience the mattress and Wi-Fi caused.

Summary Heading: Average stay, lost our phone chargers, but housecleaning claimed didn't see it...
Summary: The stay was average. The breakfast was a bit disappointing as the variety was at bare minimum.  We also left our phone chargers in the room after we checked out, and called the hotel the next day, but was told the housecleaning didn't see the chargers at all in the room.  This is not to our expectation..
Manager Response: I apologize for not finding your phone charger. I will look into the issue and send you a new phone charger. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Convenient location.  Room on the north side was noisy with every train passing by.  The room on the ground floor on the south side of the Office Bldg did not bother us in previous stays.  My wife has a steel hip and prefers bars in the shower to assist her.  Oscar does an excellent job in the breakfast room.  The breakfast is great and would be greater if meat was offered.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I will forward your compliments to Oscar, our superstar Breakfast attendant.

Summary: 1) First room I was given was in the concrete building where the interior room walls are all concrete. Not the painted cinder blocks from your college door room, but ugly mottled, unpainted concrete on every wall of the room. It looked like the walls of a city alley. I thought perhaps the room was being renovated and asked. No. apparently it‚Äôs a style choice of the hotel (???)  This wouldn't bother everyone, but I felt like paying to stay in a bunker and asked to move.  2) The only other room available was on the train side of the hotel. (which they did warn me about). It would not have been so bad had the bed not be in such horrible condition.   I travel a lot for work and have stayed in nice LaQuinta hotels. This hotel is far below their standards and in no way can it be
Manager Response: We apologized for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. As it is a historic site, we cannot alter the structure of our hotel.

Summary: We loved this hotel for its value and historic nature. Accommodations are not fancy but are very adequate. We were there for a week and did not need high end as we had plans with family near by so just needed a place to sleep and do a little work. if we wanted a destination experience facility we would have done something else, but this was perfect for our purposes. We had a small accessible room with king bed, fridge and microwave and direct access door to outside, with ramp and handicapped parking right outside. There is nothing nearby that comes close to these prices. There are three convenient food options including a 24 hour Denny's and a great burger place, Knolwood's just across the parking lots. Lots of cyclists were staying here. Staff were nice, limited TV stations
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to seeing you back at our property.

Summary: We stayed here as a large group for a waterpolo tournament.  There was a mix up with the booking but the staff were able to assist and make things less painful than it could have been.  I appreciated the fact that there was a decent gym...with working equipment. An I can safely say that the laundry services and machines can wash 16 loads of clothes and towels in quick succession.  For us, the look of the buildings and the history was fascinating.
