Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you appreciated the historic silo building. We will look forward to hosting your water polo team next year, as well.

Summary: This is an unusual hotel, in that it is an old gain silo- so it is entirely concrete. But they've converted it to a neat hotel.  There is a train that  passes nearby, so go on the other side of the tracks.  Otherwise a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: This used to be a nice hotel but it has slipped into the "unacceptable" category. Cockroaches in the room, old food under the bed, worn out furniture, bad maintenance, slow elevators and the list goes on. Shall I continue?
Manager Response: I apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. Rest assured, I will look into the issues that you mentioned and address it with the appropriate department. Thank you for your time.

Summary: Excellent stay!  Front desk folks were cheerful, knowledgeable, and professional.  Provided a nice historic perspective of the hotel including the location. Excellent service throughout my stay, convenient location  for other stores and services locally.  Will be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We will look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed one night on Valentine's Day.  The room was clean and the staff was pleasant.  Since the price was very reasonable, I consider this to be a very good value.  It even includes a simple breakfast in the morning.  Will stay again  My answers below are relative of course to your expectations for a 3-star hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope you had a lovely Valentine's Day.

Summary: This hotel was clean, had very nice linens and a great shower.  The bed was comfortable.  The breakfast had a good selection of food.  Convenient location.  The staff was friendly and accommodating.  The wi-fi was free.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: It all started at checkin. Room was advertised to be ready by 3pm. Arrived at 3:45pm and the counter person said the room wouldn‚Äôt be really until 4:30pm. Counter lady offered to call me when room was ready. Never received a call and I arrived back at hotel at 5:00pm. She said she forgot to call me back. I had reserved a room with a refrigerator as I have medicine that needs refrigeration. Also requested a ground floor room. End up on the fourth floor. When we got to the room, no refrigerator. She offered another room with frig. Got to the room and the TV didn‚Äôt work. 2 hours later a repairman shows up. Took one hour to fix. The Kleenex offered in the room only had 5  sheets of tissue in the box. Their website offers 100% guarutee so I called and after forty five minutes on the
Manager Response: I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay.

Summary Heading: Staff Excellent. Late arriving guests, pure awful
Summary: Staff was very nice/friendly and helpful. Room was comfortable, and beds/pillows were good for us. Only problem was at 11:30pm, 20-30 kids trooped onto the floor without any supervision. Loud, screaming, etc. Yelled at them. Called front desk, and made it clear this was unacceptable. Woke up the guests surrounding us. It was awful.  Note, Front desk did make it up, and helped deal with the problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I‚Äôm glad we were able to rectify the situation for you.

Summary: Trains run close by all night long.  Very hard to get a decent night‚Äôs sleep.  The noise is thunderous, and the building even shakes.   All else was fine with my stay.  The breakfast was good, room clean, staff courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We hope that you will provide us with another opportunity to make your stay more enjoyable.

Summary Heading: La Quinta Orange County - Irvine Spectrum
Summary: Location, location, location. This is an old building directly adjacent to the metrolink rail so it can get loud during the day. Did not notice rail noise after 10Pm. Breakfast is nothing special, but Denny's is on the same block. Rooms were comfortable, but outdated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: LaQuinta is not the prettiest hotel nor high end, but it is a decent place to stay at a good price, for Irvine.  Near the freeway, which you can hear from your room.  Good self serve breakfast including waffles, hard boiled eggs, fruit, yogurt, cereal (but not bacon and sausage etc).  Staff is super nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotels  High Speed WiFi is a joke .36 mbps - not even a 1  I was traveling on business and this is inexcusable   The girl in charge at the front desk said I could go to Denny‚Äôs next and try there‚Äôs  I will be in touch with there corporate office Monday
Manager Response: I apologize for the Wi-Fi service you experienced during your stay. We should have looked into the issue rather than directing you to a nearby restaurant. We will use your feedback as a coaching opportunity for our staff.

Summary: The hotel was clean and quiet and the staff is extremely friendly. the were helpful and knowledgeable about any point I required to ask about and showed the willingness to go above and beyond their required duties if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do pride ourselves on our friendly service and clean rooms. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: Great location for events at OC Great Park. Exceptionally large rooms away from the trains. Breakfast was not spectacular, but met our needs.  Refrigerator and microwave in room was a plus since we were in town for a sports tournament.  The restaurant next door was handy, as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return. Please let us know how we can receive a 5 star review when you are back.

Summary: When we booked our hotel online, we saw pictures of your standard La Quinta. When we arrived, we were told there are actually two buildings and most rooms are in the second, much older building. The second building looks like an old farm building that is being renovated. Only one elevator works, so prepare to walk a lot of stairs or through the entire building to get to your room. The rooms are small (bathroom was huge, though). By the time we got back to the hotel from our family party, we were so exhausted, we didn‚Äôt hear any of the trains the agent at check in warned us about (train track view for us). The plus side, the bed was comfortable, bathroom was huge and spacious, and the room was clean. Close access to the freeway, as well. Staff was friendly for Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. The second building you are referencing is our historic Silo building. Although it looks unfinished, the building was preserved to maintain the industrial look of Old Town Irvine. We are glad you enjoyed our beds and our proximity to the freeways. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to be prove that we are above average. Thank you again.

Summary: Stayed at hotel due to work being done on my home. Staff always helpful with smile. Room clean & comfortable. Trains went by, but it never disturbed my sleep. Breakfast was just what I liked. When I note ed the lock on my window was missing, it was still not fixed when I checked out. Since it is a safety issue (it could be slid open from the outside) it should have been fixed immediately after I reported it. Otherwise, stay was great and I would stay there again. Freeway a block way, which is very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will address the safety issue with our maintenance staff and ensure all rooms' safety concerns are addressed.

Summary: Nice amenities. Be sure to ask to be on the side of the building that the train tracks are not on, unless you are able to sleep through a train in the middle of the night, right outside your room that sounds like a wind tunnel .
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We'd love to provide an upgrade depending on availability.

Summary: The concept of the rooms by the railroad tracks is very cool. It's not everyday you get to sleep in an old grain silo. The only real problem was having to take a shower with at least 2 inches of water at the bottom of the tub, that's a little nasty. Install new shower heads that don't spray all over. May stay again if the small things are fixed.
Manager Response: Thank you. Your review will be shared with staff.

Summary: This motel is located in an old mill.  It is convenient to the I5 freeway and connections to the beach and Orange County locations.  It is not new and has few amenities to make it stand out.  The breakfast was very ordinary.  There was no paper offered.  It is not expensive and if all you want is shelter and convenience, it is adequate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Summary: Wonderful and interesting place to stay, Best breakfast in town.Staff is very friendly and helpful. Love staying here whenever we are in town.The silo is truely sound proof. The grounds are very well kept.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: Convenient, clean and friendly hotel. Close to freeway, shopping, dining and area attractions. Free breakfast with selection of cereals, breads, fruit, yogurt and waffles. Great place to relax and sleep!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: Our room was not very clean. There was a definite issue with attention to detail. There was a pillow that smelled terrible. I placed it outside of our room and it made its way back into our room when our room was cleaned. I had to put a note on it and place it outside of our room to make it go away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  It will be shared with the team at the hotel.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: My vacation over the holidays was wonderful thanks to the hotel staff, amenities and my large yet cozy room.   My pets also enjoyed it!  Morning breakfast, hot coffee and chatting with Oscar, a La Quinta food & beverage employee seemed like a dear ol' friend. Oscar's friendly and professional demeanor equals great customer service. Thank you, La Quinta Irvine Spectrum.  I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We will share your comments with our team and with Oscar. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: We have stayed at this location several times and overall it's a great place to stay. We did notice the touch surfaces in our room were a bit grimy. ( buttons on lamps, edge of refrigerator, etc. ) Also the stairwells could use a good steam cleaning.The staff is always friendly and best of all the hotel is pet friendly. They also don't charge a bunch of additional fees like other hotels do.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear this. It will be shared with team so we may get better.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: This is an interesting building, apparently previously used as a (bean?) warehouse. Its walls are concrete, bare in some places, which gives it a pleasantly protected feeling, as if one were in a well lit and open-air bunker. On one side are railroad tracks, and trains do come down the tracks at night, so if you don't like that kind of thing, make sure you get a room on the other side. All in all, an enjoyable stay, mostly because I like the building. Doesn't hurt that hotel staff have always been polite and helpful during my two stays here.
Manager Response: Thnak you for your review. It will be shared with team.  Happy New Year.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Nice place!  Clean, quiet, sleped great.... close to everything we were visiting So. cal for.  Coffee was good and the property was very clean. Staff very friendly and accommodating- Two close restaurants if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your compliments with our team. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: It was an excellent hotel, well organized, nice staff, good breakfast, quick check in and out, well located. I will recommend my friends and family to stay at this hotel if get any chance. In future, if I visit any place will try to find this hotel to pass the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed at the La Quinta Inn Irvine over Christmas while visiting family. Our family of four, including 2 teens, were first booked into a room facing the train tracks. The room, as described by others, was in the form of a silo, mimicking the original usage of the building. The room consisted of 2 double beds and a sofa bed. My daughter took the sofa bed. While we were warned about the train noise, we are fairly experienced travelers and figured we would be able to roll with the punches. We were wrong. The train (Metro Link) came through early, around 6:00 am and was loud! To top it off, apparently this hotel is pet friendly, meaning that pets can stay in any room. My daughter, who along with me are allergic to cats, must have had a cat recently lounging in the sofa bed, as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It will be shared with team.  Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: cool building unless you need to sleep
Summary: We endured three nights of loud, speeding trains that felt like they were in the room! at check in we were told that was all they had left, I would have been better off sleeping in the car. I can't imagine anyone who has stayed on that side of the building didn't have as horrible an experience as I did
Manager Response: We apologize for the trains. We are currently experimenting with different options to minimize the train noise.

Summary: Whenever we visit family in Irvine, we stay here.  Clean and well-managed. We especially appreciate Oscar, who sets up the breakfast buffet (among other things).  He's warm and friendly; one of the reasons we keep coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your compliments to Oscar, our superstar Breakfast Attendant.

Summary: Large room, very clean, and great breakfast selection. Will definitely return the next time we are in the area. One day our room wasn't serviced, but it was only 2 nights so we didn't really care.Great staff who I have no doubt would have come and serviced it immediately had we notified them.

The silo section has nice well thought out rooms. The older section rooms are small and dated. Biggest complaint: I have stayed here 5 or 6 times in the last year. The elevator in the north end of the Silo NEVER works. ALWAYS has an "out of order" sign. Can't believe that they can't get it fixed after nearly a year. Today the south Silo elevator is also "out of service." Well, I am old. I can climb stairs. but lugging my luggage up to the top floors is a real pain! They need to pony up the money to fix the elevators and then get a service contract with a vendor.
Manager Response: We are sorry about the elevator.  It has been an on going situation.  The hotel does have tow others for guest use.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: It was overall an ok stay.  Unfortunately, the bed had fleas, the toliet wasn't the best, the shower was ok, the refrigerator didn't work.  The staff was great, very tentive, and always on time for the shuttle bus.
Manager Response: We are so sorry you ran into these issues.  They will be shared with team in order to do better.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: train pass caused too much noisy
Summary: located too close to train rack.  caused so much... noisy, cannot sleep at all at night.  the location is decent.  the rooms located not on train rack side has bearable noise. the staff member did not handle the reservation accuracy.  When they made mistake, they did not handle the situation well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It will be share with team. We are working on fixes for train noise in the future.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: staying at LQ in Irvine on Sand Canyon is like family
Summary: My wife and I were owner/operators of 4 B&B s over the last 25 years.  Our philosophy was family friendly manners and operation.  This is the same feeling we get when staying at Sand Canyon LQ.  We alsways look forward to Oscar who is in charge of our breakfasts and to Patty at the front desk.  What a pleasure to spend a few minutes with them on our visits.  This is the reason we keep coming back.  And by the way our little dog Frida loves it here too.  Oh and today we had REAL BREWED COFFEE.   What a treat.   Don R
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  It will be shared with team!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Ask for room on west side to reduce freeway noise.  Front desk was unable to advise whether the 405 or 5 freeway was closer so that a travel route could be planned.  It‚Äôs 2 miles east of the 405, but immediately west of the 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We will share with team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Our room #334 was supposed to be one of the accommodations by the front desk on the third floor because of the train? (never mentioned on the website) we lay awake instead of sleeping when we were tired from the drive. Well that train goes by every hour is loud and couldn't go to sleep it scared the crap out my kids and myself we thought it was an earthquake. The room has a musty smell, one of the beds blankets was dirty, the beds were full size instead of queen size, we could hear every conversation the neighbors were having as well as their foot steps, the walls are cement so they look raw and unfinished it feels like you are in jail not comfortable at all, the heater is noisy also, the carpet definitely needs to be steamed or washed my feet were black after getting out of the
Manager Response: We are so sorry about the trains. Your comments will be shared with the team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Pleasing rooms, superior staff, crisp linen & bedding, fresh towels, good quality mattress, energetic environment, easy access to the freeway, suitable amenities and surprisingly quiet for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you, we will share review with team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: Concrete walls, dated carpet and couch
Summary: Perhaps its considered edgy, but in the silo building all of the walls in the room are concrete, not covered, just plain old cement walls.  Feels like a prison except in prison they paint the walls!  Also the carpeting and the couch in my room looked to be from the mid 70's perhaps.  Doesn't make me feel like the place is clean, but the linens and the bathroom seemed to be clean.  Breakfast was typical La Quinta breakfast which is convenient and nice that its free.   I had called ahead the day before I arrived to schedule my airport shuttle, they didn't show up and when I called, it seemed they had no record of my call, they promised someone would come get me.  About 20 minutes later they called me back and said they couldn't find the shuttle driver.  So the front desk clerk

Room layout was not user friendly. There were no charging ports near bed. Iron boards were there for namesake and couldnt hook to any ports. Two of the four lightings were not working. Could have kept moisturizer along toilet accecories.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your comments with the Housekeeping department to find a more efficient place for our moisturizer. We will also look into adding more electrical outlets.

Summary: if you want to be able to wake up every hour, be sure to ask for a room facing the tracks.  There you'll be scared crapless as the sound of a jet engine escalates toward you and confuses you.   We got room 136.   I had NO idea there was a train right there. So once I finally got to sleep at like midnight because my king bed was harder than the cement walls that are so fashionably displayed all over the place I was woken to the alarmingly loud whirring of a light rail train passing my room.   I asked the people across the hall if they heard the train all night, they were like, what train? ARE YOU KIDDING ME? so yeah. dont get the side that faces the tracks. unless you wanna be a in crappy mood all day.   My TV didn't work. I killed a roach on the bathroom wall. why do bathroom
Manager Response: I apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. We will use your feedback to coach our staff to address noise complaints in a more effective way. Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.

Summary Heading: It's ok if you need to be in this area
Summary: Good example of 2.5 star hotel. About average everything. Nothing distinguishing beyond the proximity to highway, and likely other locations. The single outlet available was wonky, and threatened to go dark as the a new charging device was added. Bed was reasonably comfortable. Train was literally below my room. Entire stay felt like just an eyeline above acceptable.

Having stayed with La Quinta many times before, and once at this particular property, I will have to say I was thoroughly disappointed with my stay here.  The guest rooms were disgusting, and thoroughly depressing with the cement walls. The reservations/front desk was clueless and not helpful at all even though they totally screwed up our reservation! The air conditioner in our room was so loud we could barely sleep.  I was so uncomfortable with the cleanliness of the room that I didn't even want to get inside the bed sheets!  I will NEVER return to this property again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will address your concern with our Front Desk team so that we can improve our operation.

Summary: Have used this hotel various times when visiting family in Orange Co.  Love hotel for many reason but most of all that they allow pets. Breakfast is simple yet nice.  Always there to help in many ways.  Location is awesome and around many eating places.  I have stayed here many of times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute for a baseball tournament my son had in the area.  We chose this particular hotel, because it was the midway point to our game locations and was close enough to the freeway.  The hotel was clean, staff was friendly and helpful.  The only thing I would advise is if you are a light sleeper, to make sure to ask for a room away from the train tracks.  The room we had backed to the tracks, it's not bad during the day since we were not in the room, but the train runs every 30 min along the backside of the hotel.  They do provide ear plugs if you need it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will make sure to share with staff at hotel.  Happy Holidays.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Came for the holiday weekend.  First time staying at a pet friendly hotel.   Great location.  comfortable bed.  Room was clean, but not glamorous.   Staff was accommodating and helpful.   Wifi worked well.  Loved the old historical buildings onsite.   Breakfast provided met our needs, fresh fruit and bagles or waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share with our team. We will look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Frequent stays at La Quinta in Irvine
Summary: I've been staying at the La Quinta in Irvine for an average of 5 nights a month for the last six months due to a project I'm working on in the area.  Ron (the manager) and his staff always go out of their way to accommodate me.  They all really are about doing things right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your compliments to Ron, our wonderful Front Desk Service Representative.

Summary Heading: Trendy and Awesome to Dismal and Old
Summary: I stayed at this hotel twice during my stay.  The first experience was great!  The room was a surprise~ it was trendy with nicely decorated with concrete walls and a very comfortable bed.  Such a great value! My stay was so nice that when additional family arrived we changed hotels to go back to the La Quinta.  I was so disappointed in the room we received.  I expected the same quality especially since the rate was higher.  The room we received was dismal and depressing.  It was hard to believe I was at the same hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Next time you visit Irvine and our property, please request a room in the Silo building. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Booked for 4 nights. Arrived at 1am for check-in due to my flight arrival and being exhausted from a full day of work and travel all I wanted was sleep. check in was fine and should have known to run when the hotel desk clerk handed me ear plugs but it was 1am and where do I go at that hour without research. The only room they had was in the historic part of hotel. All walls in hallway and bedroom are concrete and backs to train tracks 10 feet outside window which we were on the first floor. The train runs ALL night long. There was locomotive and in the early hours the metro. After only 6 hours there we woke up at 7am and checked out of the hotel. I have a video but can not post due to explicit language as I had been up all night and was extremely tired and cranky. Know before

We were assigned a room which was right next to train tracks. This rail route seems to have very busy schedule as there were trains nearly every 30 min. To be fair we were told that our room would be next to the tracks but that was the only available room. The light on the vanity did not work. The breakfast is abysmally bad!
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We are currently experimenting with different ways to mitigate the noise from the trains.

Summary: Our stay was very pleasant.  The woman at check in up graded us when we said we didn't want to be next to the railroad track.  The room is a refurbished grain silo.  Sounds strange, but it's actually unique and somewhat of a conversation piece.  The room has a hexagon shape.  I would recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Train pass your room every 15 minutes 24 hours
Summary: Awful place if you are hoping to rest. I was not inform of the train next to my window until I checked in and got my keys. All night I could not sleep feeling there was ab earthquake every 15 minutes as train passed by.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We are looking into options to mitigate the noise. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great hotel if you don't like sleeping
Summary: Having a railroad tracks within several feet of the room's window meant very little sleep.  The trains - which ran throughout the night - were incredible loud.  Also, the bathroom was not cleaned very well.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary Heading: Train train train.   Aweful loud horrid hotel.   Front desk staff no help
Summary: 13 times a day and early morning.  Entire building shakes.   Front desk try's to upsel to non train room.   Which I can't imagine are any better.  No where in room description on Expedia is train mentioned.
Manager Response: I apologize for any inconvenience you encountered during your stay. We will use your feedback to coach our staff to clearly inform our guests of the specific location of our property.

Summary: Part of this hotel uses an old multi-story grain bin for rooms.  The rooms are very quiet and comfortable with all the modern conveniences.  Some of the nearby buildings also have historic interest.  Staff was pleasant and efficient, everything was clean.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: How to lock yourself out of your own room with key cards in hand
Summary: So, returning from breakfast one morning I found that I could not regain access to my room. The key cards were showing red on the door. I had the keys re-magnetized at the front desk and the same thing occurred. When I returned to tell them I still could not gain access to the room, they asked if I locked the door. I told them that I didn't understand what that meant since the door locks itself when you leave. They said there is a switch on the door that if "activated" will lock the door and deny all key cards. I asked if that lock automatically unlocks itself when you leave the room. They said no, you can lock it and leave the room. I asked why would someone want to do that. The response was that they weren't sure but it's been a problem for a lot of people. It took 3
Manager Response: We are sorry you had issues with your lock.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: it seems like this is a new area, it was clean and seemed safe.   the staff was excellent, I was caught in LA traffic and was very late to check in. The staff had me in my room within 5 minutes, thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you!  This will be shared with team!

Summary: Great place to stay, although the train passing by early can be an issue. The rooms were clean and well kept. The building itself is very interesting and seems to have a history. I would recommend staying here

For the price you should stay at another hotel.   There were bugs in the room. The service staff were unprofessional and the manager even worst. After informing the staff of issues, they still did not assist. I would never recommend staying here. I ended up only staying 2 nights instead of 4 and moved to another hotel for a better value.
Manager Response: We are sorry, this is not the service we want you to have.  Your review will be shared with the team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Love this place.  The design is unique and the concrete walls decreasing excess noise.  However, on this trip I was in a room that did not smell pleasant.  I had a mildew oder.  I would still stay here, hopefully in a better smelling room.
Manager Response: Thank you.  We will look at that A/C

Summary: Cool building, location worked for my travel plans, but having train tracks right next to the hotel made it hard to sleep.   I recommend some ear plugs or a stiff drink before attempting to sleep.   Again, it was clean enough and right where I needed to be for my business in town.

I enjoyed my stay here. It was very interesting that the room we were staying in was part of a former factory. Free wi-fi was nice, hotel was clean and breakfast was nice. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Customer service was superb and the room was cleaner than anticipated.  there was a little issue with the bathroom appearance as the stucco on the ceiling was coming off, other than that we all had enjoyed our stay.  Keep up the great work!  will be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your comments with our team.

Summary: we walked in about 11:30pm & very exhausted. when we walked in the room smelled old and musky? then the bath temperature was backwards on the indicator. but we overlooked all that to try to get some sleep. About 2am i herd the first train! I thought it was a earthquake! I ran to the source that woke which was at the window and a train was passing by! Train passed by about 6 times threw out the night! Worst night of sleep
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your concerns with our Housekeeping department.

Summary: I have spent my trips with La Quinta in Vegas and Irvine. Both places are very good and worth the money spent. Even they allowed pet but they manage to keep the rooms clean and free of odors. I wish they will update the plumbing to prevent water leaking since we are in very severe drought status. Also the deep cleaning for the carpets should be considered.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Simple hotel, The train was driving on the back site of the hotel was very loud. The swimming pool area was dirty. The breakfast was very simple. The reception people were very helpful and gave good advise.

Summary Heading: Very Disappointing Stay at Irvine LaQuinta
Summary: Our 5-day stay at Irvine La-Quinta was VERY disappointing. The A/C didn't work properly, so we had to endure room temperatures around 80 degrees; said they'd look into it but no change. One day our room was not cleaned, even though we left about 10:30. One time the Elevator jammed and stuck closed. Our stay was a nightmare!
Manager Response: I apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We will address your concerns with our Maintenance and Housekeeping team. Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.

Summary: A little hard to find, because the entry and hotel are not actually on Sand Canyon, but on a side street off of it.  The rooms in the silos as they are referred to, are unique and very nice, but a little different.  Even though I had reservation for over three days prior, the desk agent was unsure if the room was ready, and had to leave the front desk unattended for quite some time to check the room.  Another potential customer got tired of waiting, and just left.  There were 4 Irvine police cruisers there for quite awhile on the day I checked out, but unsure why.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Police swarmed (I saw at 5 officers) the hotel, person in handcuffs in the lobby.  Police running through the hotel.  I'm not feeling safe at all.  Guests were not informed as to what was going on.  The bathtub faucet dripped all night, the bed was lumpy and the box spring was filthy.  Would never go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  I am sorry we can not share what the police was doing.    Your other comments will be share with staff.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: We stayed overnight at this hotel it was not our best stay at a Laquita.
Summary: We didn't feel this room was as clean as it should have been. The doors are not in a lobby they are to the outside. Some time in the night a freight train was going by more than once. The room smelled like smoke. It was nice that it was close the the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have taken care of smoke smell. I am sorry about the trains. We will share this with team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: La Quinta Orange County is well located for our needs like visiting friends, family and area attractions.  The room value is outstanding for benefit received.  The property has been very well maintained, is well managed, has friendly staff, comfortable beds, adequate breakfast, and the rooms large, comfortable and are very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I was honestly let down by the quality of this La Quinta. It was overall below the standards of the company. Compare to the other LQ I've stayed in. My rooms was missing soaps and some towels. I will be contacting the cooperate office regarding my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will address this with our team to provide you with the best service and quality in the future.

Summary: I stayed here last year, and lived the history of the building. The access to the highway can't be beat. We were able to get to all of the southern beaches with ease. Plus there is food and gas choices right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will share with my team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: Great, Contemporary Hotel with a Edge!
Summary: Straight up, judging from reviews I have seen, I guess not everyone has the same taste as I.   But, I love this place! It is sooo cool! You can stay in an old concrete lima bean silo, if you ask for that building. And, from what I can gather, if you get a king room with sofa bed, you will get one that appears to be a very large, octagonal concrete room!  We opted for the cheaper two double-bed room on the fourth floor. Also, cool. We got a "deluxe room" away from the train tracks. It's true, when the trains came racing by and I was outside by the pool, they made quite a stir. Whoosh! Wow! So close!  Many people have written that they did not like being to close to the tracks; but, being high up on the opposite side, we only felt a slight vibration once and heard a very quite
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!!  I will share with my team. See you next time.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: love our stays in the silos
Summary: we have stayed here many times with our pet traveling thru Irvine visiting family in the area. Really like the unique silo rooms & the managers quarters.Always enjoyable...friendly staff...clean rooms...pet friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We share your appreciation for our unique Silo building.

Summary: We used to be a regular visitor to the area and La Quinta, Spectrum for many years. We returned to visit and thought to stay at La Quinta. However, this stay did not meet the expectations of previous visits. There was a strong tobacco odor on our floor that permeated our room. The air conditioner did not cool adequately. I will not be returning to this La Quinta on future stays.

overall great stay- upon arrival switched my room and got into the silo building. Had a slight funk but the building had character. I didn't like the breakfast options so I didn't use it. Check in agent was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Clean, moderately priced La Quintal with breakfast!
Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful--as much as they could be but a little lackidaisical.  For visitors it would be helpful if they had some knowledge about current festivals, distances to key beaches, etc.  They showed little if any real concern about the large lad that smoked immediately outside our room.  We were awakened in the wee hours of the morning by the smoke coming into the room.  Very disturbing since one of us has asthma. Large, inviting pool and jacuzzi.  Our dbl. queen bed had ample room for 4 to move around.  Desk with chair limited seating to beds vs. table and chairs which one might expect with the upgrade.  The continental breakfast of do-your-self waffles, assorted breads (bagels, etc.) cereal and hard-boiled eggs was filling.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It will be shared with staff in order to make future stays better.  Thnak you,   La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Love the hotel.  I wish it would be closer to the Spectrum area.  Still great hotel to stay for a reasonable price. Would not go hungry as Denny's and Jack in the Box is close by and open 24 hrs.  Hotel sits right next to the Interstate 5 freeway so its hard to miss.  Just look for the old Mill looking building, a bit funky but it actually add to the charm.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: I chose this hotel because it was a pet friendly choice while our home was being repaired for over two weeks.  While part of the hotel is in a restored historic building, the other half of the hotel is in a building in much need of refurbishment and updating. We were in what I speculate was the poor half. It was also, at that time, the building with no functional elevator.  We ended up staying for several weeks total and at no time felt the room was adequately cleaned (including on arrival).  At one point a cup of water was spilled on the floor.  When I attempted to dry this with towels, the towels I used to dry the floor with came away nearly black (the carpet pattern is very dark and was obviously hiding much).    There is a washer and dryer on the outside of the building, but
Manager Response: Hi, I would love to speak to you about your experience at our La Quinta in Irvine, CA. Can you give me a call at your earliest convenience? Thank you.

Summary: Found this hotel while using a search engine and the hotel had decent reviews and for the price, I thought it was a safe bet.  Wrong?  Why the bad review, my room was directly behind the train tracks.  No exaggeration, but I could throw a rock underhanded and hit the train.  That is how close the train was in comparison to the room.  The train ran between 8 am--10 PM, that train is running hourly and without apologies.  Even for those heavy sleepers, this train is loud and fast, and will likely wake you up.  Furthermore, the train runs even at 3 AM because that is what time I was awoken.  I even complained to the desk and the standard answer, "sorry we have no other rooms" was the answer I received.  Save your money, stay elsewhere and I would never bring my family to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary Heading: Weird Hotel, cement walls, built in a grain silo next to a train station
Summary: I booked this hotel for my husband for a business trip.  The location and price were terrific and the hotel offered free same day cancellation, free breakfast, free parking and free WIFI.    The hotel was built out of a grain silo, so it's a very strange layout made of cement.  He said it was very weird to stay in a room with cement walls. It sort of looked like a jail cell, from what I saw on video chat.  The room had nice bedding and amenities, it was clean and the service was acceptable.  When my husband checked in, he was informed that the only rooms left were next to the train tracks.  The hotel is right next to the Metrolink station, so it was he was able to hear breaks of the train, and train noises into the night and then again in the early am.  Lastly, this hotel is pet

Summary Heading: Stay in an unusual and historic place
Summary: Staying in a silo was a fun part of our adventure. The rooms are cleverly installed on the vastness of some retired lima bean silos, with much of the original industrial equipment still on the building. It is located between the railroad tracks and the I-5 interstate. Once in the room, we heard no traffic at all. Wonderful quiet room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We share your enthusiasm for our unique and historic silo rooms. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This hotel woul have been nice. price is reasonable. If not for the train passing by every hour (or it seems like it) in the middle of the night, I would have given a higher rating. I was ready to checkout the next day,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are looking into ways to minimize the train noise perceived by our guests.

Summary: What a pleasure to stay in this quirky re-purposed grain mill!  Has a contemporary and fun feel to the decor and shapes of the rooms and hallways.  Friendly, helpful reception staff. Totally enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We share your appreciation for our unique property. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: So I like the actual place. Very cool. An old warehouse turned into a hotel in my opinion is pretty cool. I thought it was cool the way the rooms were carved out.. Service was friendly, and breakfast was as good as most continentals are. However... it is extremely close to the train tracks. I was with my wife, and two young daughters, and starting at about 930 pm was hit with what sounded like a bullet train running right through my room. These things are moving!!! I would guess I heard at least 5-6 of these throughout the night. I mean I can't really complain to the hotel, cause they certainly don't control the rail system, but I'm not to sure I would go back again given the circumstances.

Would stay again for the comfy bed, clean rooms and nice staff. Close to the major freeways. One thing I want to note is that person who sleeps next to the air conditioner may be a bit uncomfortable with cold air blowing at them the whole night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: A little disappointed as the bed spring was painful &maid should have reported it. We called the front desk about it and they said we could change rooms but actually we know they didn't have another room like the one we had we needed two beds and a couch and we had already unpacked everything and were obviously getting in bed I'm just very disappointed the made didn't see it and reported it so maybe they should check their Maids a little better we're usually stay there all the time were usually very happy with it we enjoyed the pool in the hot tub and the amenities just a little disappointed. We will stay again but I will check the rooms first thank you very much
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We will get that bed replaced.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: Very disappointed in this La Quinta Inn
Summary: We booked this La Quinta Inn for  a 5 night stay over Labor Day Weekend .  Our room was in the "warehouse" annex and it was really bare bones.  Concrete walls, unpainted.   The room was small and sparsely furnished.  The bed was comfortable, but other than that, the room was not a place where one could relax.  I stayed just two weeks ago in the La Quinta Inn in La Palma and it was very nice--really a world of difference..   breakfast was barely adequate, though it was not billed to be any better.   The cold water in the sink never got cold.   And the shower had nothing to hold onto to get in and out of the tub--really rather dangerous.  We come down here often to visit family, and we will NEVER stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am sorry you did not like our 100 year old converted Grain Silo. We will share review with team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: Not a bad hotel for the price
Summary: I had to stay somewhere near my child's school and I only booked it the same day and was happy with the stay. The bedroom was nice but I felt a bit uncomfortable sleeping. The breakfast was adequate for my needs. I will probably stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I have stayed at this La Quinta before because it is freeway close and close to most things in Southern Orange County. I have found the Inn has recently been remodeled, the rooms are quite nice and CLEAN! Most of the Staff are friendly and knowledgable, WATCH OUT FOR PATTY, she does not belong in the Hospitality Industry!! There is plenty of FREE parking. The morning breakfast is between 6am and 9am, it has all the basics but no scrambled egg, no bacon, and no sausage. I will recommend this Inn to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I will use your review as a coaching opportunity for our Front Desk team, so that we can provide you with the best service in the future.

Summary Heading: Not what I expected in a LaQuinta
Summary: The Room had an odor and the train tracks are literally so close to the building you can hardly see them out the window.  The double beds were uncomfortable and the rooms looked like they needed to be updated. The bathroom had hair in the shower like it hadn't been cleaned well so i cleaned it before getting in.   The breakfast staff was friendly and it was stocked well.
Manager Response: We apologize for the issues that you encountered during your stay. I will forward your concern to the appropriate department, so that we can improve our operation. Thank you for your time.

Summary: We decided to use La Quinta Inn while our home was being worked on for mold. The first room they gave us smelled musky and had a mildew smell. The carpet was also a little damp. It was very dark in the room an our pup DID NOT like the room at all. So we let the front desk know. The lady at the front desk was very nice but told us that it might be due to them not shampooing the carpet properly (shouldn't they have checked before offering the room?). So she gave us a room on the 3rd floor of the main building. We lugged all our belonging with our cranky, fussy 1 1/2 year old and pup up to the room; as soon as we open the door we walk into a room that reeks of cigarette smoke. I tried calling the front desk so we didn't have to lug everything back down but there's no number for the
Manager Response: We apologize for the issues that you encountered during your stay. I will forward your concern to the appropriate department, so that we can improve our operation. Thank you for your time.

Summary: The hotel was not what I expected, bathroom filthy, moldy shower curtain and tiles and carpet.  Noisy area with trains running through out day and night.  We moved to another hotel where we have stayed before and had nothing but the best.  The breakfast had nothing that was healthy for us to eat other than hard boiled egg and an orange.
Manager Response: We apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. I will forward your concern to the appropriate department to address those concerns. Thank you for your time.

Summary: Great place to stay if have to work in Southern Orange County or just visiting friends or family.   Plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby.  Not far from the beach (Laguna).  Rates very reasonable... with quick connections  to the 5 & 133 freeways and minutes from the 405 freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary: Nice buildings and grounds.  Located nearby restaurants and work site.  Train was a definite problem for sleep throughout the night. Disappointed that the location of the train was not mentioned. At checkin time.  Will not stay at this facility again.

Hotel was poorly managed , was given a room that was suppose to be an upgrade , room was dirty , old faucet in the shower that leaked along with a moldy smelling shower curtain a microwave that didn't work and AC unit that blew out an awful smell, over all completely disappointed .
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I will forward your concerns to the appropriate department. Rest assured we will use your feedback to improve our operation.

Summary: The train woke us up every hour on the hour. Front desk told us we wouldn't hear it from the 4th floor. That was a lie.they could have moved us to a room on the other side which was away from the tracks but didn't bother to.
Manager Response: We are sorry about the train situation.   La Quinta Irvine

Summary: I loved being in a converted building.  It made me feel good that the original building was not torn down to make room for the hotel.  Being by the old train yard was plus.  My son loves trains and he could watch them go by as we swam in the pool.  The trains were not loud at night (they were not running then).  The hotel was near the highway and close to several beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel. We will share with staff.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: LQ use to be my favorite place to stay clean and friendly , but my last visit to this location I was very disappointed the front desk personnel was very unpleasant and unfriendly, the bathroom shower clogged when we took a shower we just couldn't wait to leave next day . I would never stay at LQ anymore . That place needs to be remodeled and needs to be cleaned a little better .
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. I will use your feedback as a coaching opportunity to improve our operation.

Summary: Checked in to a very outdated room.  Beds were very uncomfortable.  Carpet had stains, and room didn't feel clean. A/C is loud and when the guest outside were smoking pot, the smell would come into the room.  I've been to other La Quinta and this by far had the worst breakfast options.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is through feedback like yours that we are able to improve our operation.

Summary Heading: Stayed two nights because we came from AZ. to go to a celebration of life.
Summary: We have been here twice before and its been along time ago and that place in my opinion has gone down. The carpets in the hallways were dirty and should be replaced. The "Breakfast" was not a breakfast . All they had out was bread for toast, bagels, and waffles. A little bit of fruit. When we were there in the past the breakfast was much better. The grounds were dirty as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will use your feedback as a learning opportunity to better our operation.

Summary: Traveling for Sports Tournaments is Awesome when staying here...the Free Waffle Breakfast Bar is the Kids Favorite! I love that when I always ask for More Bath Towels that they are delivered with a Smile and a Thank You for staying with us!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Clean Cement Blockhouse between the train tracks & the freeway
Summary: The back building at this site is an all cement building (perhaps historical).  The building and our room had cement walls all around, with but one picture to lessen the cold feel of the cement, along with the curtains over the window that overlooked at the train tracks about 20' away.  The outlets & switches were necessarily surface mounted on the cement.  (The front building is probably a traditional LQ.)  Maybe the cement lessened the noise of the commuter trains before dawn, but not enough.  These were no slow, rumbling freight trains.  No, we got a fwump, fwump, fwump, so we could count the cars as they sped past the window at what sounded like 80+ mph.  We only made the decision that day to stay in Irvine, and didn't have many choices.  I had a favorable impression of LQ
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the experience you had during your previous stay. We will use your feedback as a learning opportunity to improve our operation. Thank you.

Summary: It was nice... maybe don't expect someone to write a bunch of stuff for a quick review. The room had all the necessary walls, working plumbing, and lights one would expect when paying for a hotel room.

Summary Heading: Pet friendly, not people friendly, tidy wise
Summary: Pet friendly which is great, BUT they need to be more mindful of this and do a better job of cleaning carpets and outside where pets poop and pee.  Equipment/furniture was old and out dated. Need to replace stained bed linens and old roll a way stained beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I will forward your concerns to our Housekeeping department.

Summary: 3x too get into room, lock had to be reprogrammed, a/c unit faulty, every half hour it sound like military jets were landing nearby, room was dirty including bedspread and bathroom, noise, trash outside overflowing. Cost too high.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Rest assured we will use your feedback as an opportunity to help improve our operation.

Summary: I'll summarize our overnight stay at this hotel with my wife's comment: "sometimes, you get a dud". If the cost was half of what we paid, we might think differently - they call it "Inn and Suites", but it's really nothing more than an extremely modest motel. Rooms are accessible from the outside hallway - meaning that if want a bit of outside fresh air and light you have to be willing to wave to your neighbors as they walk by. But here is the real kicker: because my wife and I were traveling with our teenage daughter, we wanted a bit of privacy so we reserved the "two room suite", the room that they will say is the nicest room in the place. HA! This is one very large room (not counting the kitchen) - even the sink and dressing area are exposed to the rest of the room. We had to
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize for your experience at our property.

Summary Heading: Historical Property/Train Noise No Big Deal
Summary: Great staff and convenient location.  Good value.  Property has great background story of being part of historical Irvine Ranch.  See photo attached of info provided by the hotel when I checked out and was asking questions.  I was concerned when I looked out my ground floor room in one of the silos to see train tracks.  While you can hear a train go by (They are very short/few cars) it is not the traditional clackity clack of a traditional train -  more like a swoosh and is unlikely to wake up the average sleeper.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Excellent front desk staff - Patricia and David were very helpful.  The room was trainside and the trains were interesting and not too loud.  The concrete walls kept out any noise from adjoining rooms.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary: From the front desk to the great staff I am happy to be here for an extended stay. Yadira has been greeting folks up front and taking care of visitors and travelers. Patricia was also very helpful with my needs. It's a comfortable stay, thank you..!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will share your compliments with our staff, especially Yadira and Patricia.

Summary Heading: Best La Quinta I've stayed at in So Cal
Summary: We stay at many different La Qunitas, main reason is we always travel with our dog.  He has to stay in the hotel room for a couple of hours at a time when we are unable to take him to where we are going and, unfortunately, he barks a lot, but I never have the staff complain and tell us to leave.  People did leave mean notes on the door, but all I can really say is, they know that this is a pet friendly hotel, so I feel like they can stay somewhere where pets AREN'T allowed if they are worried about barking dogs.  That is the most important reason I go to La Quinta, so my dog is safe while we are away from him.  This La Quinta we stayed in the old grain mill section and it was beautiful.  Its a historic sight.  The grain mill was converted into a hotel.  The room was great!  2
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We're so happy that you enjoyed your stay at our LQ. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Terrible place to stay...would not recommend this to any one.  I felt like it was a "Homeless Shelter"  very noisy and train runs right behind it and a freeway in front of it.  Kids running around the halls late at night and crying babies.  Lots of noise early in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review hotel. Summer with families can be tough.

Summary Heading: Great escape from fireworks with dogs on the 4th of July
Summary: We had one purpose for our visit - this location was recommended by others as a way to escape fireworks noise. Literally everyone I encountered after check-in had a dog with them. We heard no firecrackers, M-80's or other large booms. My dogs were concerned about the train sound, but fortunately didn't react. The other guests were not particularly noisy.  The rooms had plenty of room for large dog beds (we brought two of the 36" rounds from Costco). There is a pet potty area outside the south end of the granary building, and the adjacent parking lot was virtually empty at night and was a safe place to walk the dogs before bed.  That said, the looks of the place are in the "interesting" category, and if you don't appreciate board-formed concrete walls, and visible conduit running
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel.  See you next time!

Summary: I'm not sure who had the bright idea of building a hotel next to a train track but there was literally a train track two feet outside my window.  I could not sleep, the train would pass by every 45 minutes waking me in the middle of the night.  If you want to get a good night's rest, DO NOT stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize for the experience you had at our property. We are experimenting with different options to mitigate some of the noise from the trains.

Summary: Any time I come to Irvine to visit my mother I stay here. The rooms are always clean and I love that they have HD flat screen tv's. I enjoyed spending time at the pool. It was very clean and kept up with. Patricia at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. Actually anybody that i have encountered at the front desk when checking in was friendly. Ever since the 2 new GM's Todd and David have came to this property yu can tell that they standards have gone up. The location is convienently off of the freeway and in the same parking lot as 2 restaurants. I would recommend staying here if you ever come to Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thnak you for your review. I will share with Team!!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: The management needs to be informed of proper check in processes and computor programs brought up to speed.
Summary: The check in process is not 21st century technology and the ash deposit pots located close to the entry doors to the lobby facilitates smokers but is a turn off to none smokers because of odor and smoke.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I will share with my staff.  Thank you,   La Quinta Irvine

Summary: We originally booked the hotel and cancelled, but there was a system error on the payments that caused us problems(it was an issue with booking.com) , but the staff(specifically Patricia) helped us and solved our problem with patience.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to do a review.  I will share your comments with staff!!  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Pretty good motel, but an average motel. The room was nice, but the bathroom fixtures were from 1970. The exterior is old school features, symbolic of my travels in the 1970's with my grandparents on road trips to Oregon.  They updated the room I stayed in but the small toilet /bathtub closet is an old-school closet.

Summary Heading: Rooms within a few feet of a train track
Summary: The room looks as though it's in a partially renovated. The worst thing is that there is a train track within a few feet of the room. Trains were running through the night. To be fair the reception told me this after I had already checked in. I'd recommend staying away from this hotel if you want a good night sleep. My room was prepaid by my company so I didn't complain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are looking into options to reduce the noise from the trains.

Summary: Rented king bed-Clean rooms, decent amenities its just in the separate building (2 on premise) the rooms are made out of soild concrete (inside and out!)and very blah inside. The room never got light enough to work on business projects and in order to get breakfast you had to trek across the parking lot to the lobby which is difficult if you are elderly or have a handicap. Customer service is excellent, pool and spa clean, next to Dennys, across from gas station and massage business. Recommend just be warned the rooms and site are different than your typical LQ
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review.  We will share your review with our team in our next meeting.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: I stayed in a converted grain silo.  The room had thick walls and was very quiet.  Room was well insulated so a stable temperature was easy to maintain.  Housekeeping and front desk were professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review.  We will share your review with our team in our next meeting.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: The hotel is a combination of a traditional motel building and a renovated/modified hotel in a grain silo facility. A freeway on one side and a rail line on the other. Good sound insulation, better than expected, but less than perfect. I live by the ocean and this was quieter than home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We also love our unique, one-of-a-kind bean silo that has been converted into a hotel. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The Silo building is a very unique building for a hotel room and I would recommend staying there if you are in the area.  The only negative are the new matrresses are a strange size and the possible train noise.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review.  We will share your review with our team in our next meeting.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: We decided to stay here using points. We had never ever been here and the reviews seemed good. The staff was nice to some degree and the building they put us in was really awesome. It was a grain silo once upon a time. It has a lot of charm and history. Bring from Missouri and Kansas this was like being home some what.   I wear a special cross necklace that was given to me by my father who passed away 10 years ago. He gave me the necklace in memory of his brother my uncle. My uncle served in the Korean War. He was a silver and bronze star recipient. He also recived a purple heart. When I come into my hotel room I take my necklace off and place it on the TV stand or where ever the TV is. This way I know where it is at all times. I've been doing this for over 15 years. When we
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are sorry you lost an item. If anything is found e will be in touch with you directly.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Over all stay was great, room was very clean, staff very friendly and helpful. Only delay was a line during check in. Breakfast was okay , I did expect a little more variety. But overall the stay was great, very pleased with the customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review.  We will share your review with our team in our next meeting.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Carpets were badly stained. 1st room smelled like smoke, 2nd room like piss. Door didn't shut right.  Staff appears to be living in the hotel (motel). They party all night, in/out of their room constantly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. This is definitely not the experience we want you to have. I have forwarded your concerns to our Maintenance and Housekeeping teams and they will address those issues accordingly. I apologize for the issues you encountered and I hope you will give us another opportunity to make things right the next time you stay with us.

Summary: We come to Irvine at least once a year and we have stayed at other more expensive hotels before we became friends with the people at LaQuinta Irvine. We love to stay in the silo. LaQuinta has shown great respect for the historic integrity of the structures that were once a part of a large farm. The art work is tasteful and is also from the same period. The service at LaQuinta is as good as any 5 star hotel. We enjoy Yardina, Franklin, Patricia and Ron from the front desk. The team at the front desk worked their magic so that we could be on the first floor in the silo and be close to eveything we need as active seniors with some health issues. Our room was wonderful and we feel like we are treated like Stars at LaQuinta because they treat everyone with great respect. Our needs
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you!  We will share with team!!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: A blah hotel in a city with many great ones
Summary: Title says it all.  Irvine has a lot of nice hotels.  Choose another.  The breakfast is underwhelming, a bulk of rooms face the train so that's fun.  The rooms look like they're original to the building.  Check out Hotel Irvine or one of the other hotels further north.  I stayed here only because it was close to the house we were moving out of.  What a mistake.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize that you did not enjoy your stay. We are looking to add more breakfast items in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beware the rooms near the railroad!!
Summary: The hotel is nice. At time of booking, I didn't knew it was constructed on a historic landmark (old train station). The train no more stops there but it passes just beside some hotel rooms. I wasn't warned at time of check-in. Afterwards you get annoyed of the noise. If you have to stay here, let the front desk know you don't want those rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! Because our historic property is a converted bean silo/export location, we do have trains that frequently pass by due to the proximity of the train tracks. We will use your feedback as a coaching opportunity for our staff to warn guests about the property's location in relation to the train tracks. Thank you!

Summary Heading: "PET FRIENDLY" means dogs everywhere.  This is a policy getting out of control and taken advantage of.
Summary: Nice property, but the pet population is getting out of hand!  I want a place to stay, sleep, and swim.   It looked like I was at a kennel.  There were dogs everywhere.  I did not see a yard exclusive for the dogs, but I saw dogs in the lobbies, in the hallways, around the pool, in the parking lot, in arms, in carriers and cars.  Dogs were doing their business in the parking lot, and against tires and trees.  Several dogs barked at my kids, in unfriendly tones.  WHAT IS UP WITH THE TRAVELING DOGS???
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: great service had a wonderful stay. enjoyed breakfast, quiet, clean and well maintained.  The staff was very informative and nice to talk to. I wold be pleased to stay there again and again.  Great location, great views, traffic not bad ie commute.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send us a review!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms. Nice stay. Would return. Easy access from I-5 or 405. laQuinta fits our budget just right. We are going on a 7,000 road trip and have booked laQuinta in every city available on our trip. We have a pet and it so nice to know that all our stays are pet friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel.  I will make sure to share your review in our next team meeting!  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Close tp family so stay is related to family functions. Convenience is top priority. Access and traffic were major concerns.  Found access very easy and near shopping. Recommend GPS equipped vehicle due to spaghetti road network of unfamiliar with area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review!  See you next time!!  La Quinta irvine

Summary: I liked that breakfast was served but I wish there were more options. The dining area was extremely clean and organized however so I didn't really care that there weren't more to choose from. The elevators could use a little improvement though.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to do a review. We will be looking at our breakfast options soon!  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: I was traveling on business and had booked ahead and had no issues with my reservation and was able to get checked in quickly. Rooms were clean and breakfast provided plenty of variety. Staff were friendly and helpful. Would stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Wow! Thank you!  I will share with my team!!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: I have to say my name is Lavell Jones am an elite member of the rewards program for La quinta. I love these propertie. I love the manager ( Front desk) (Paterica) has been very helpful evry time i come there. The staff is amazing. Thats why i keep coming back there. I had one issue about 2 weeks ago but they fix the issue right away. The staff is wonderful. They are very pleasant and nice. Ron is a very hard worker and greates me by name and knows exactly what i want when i get there. I feel everyone knows my name now. Am there almost ever weekend. Lol keep up the wonderful work. I dont have a complaint at all. You guys are very pleasant and all deserve a raise. I will see you guys soon because i will keep coming back there. Thank you guys for your outstanding customer services.
Manager Response: Dear Lavell,  Thank you so much for the great review!!  I will share with my team!  They will love it!  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: The rooms were super clean and super spacious. The employees always go above and beyond! The price is great , there's no pet fees and they clean your room daily unlike other hotels where I was told I need to pay extra to have the room cleaned. Totally worth the price , everything you'll need is near by and I've never heard the highway or train from my room
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your great review!!  I will share with my team!! Hope to see you soon!!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: A Get Away with the Little Buddies Too !
Summary: Centrally located , freeway close , attentive staff , relaxing atmosphere , captivating historic site , PETS allowed - and the reasons for staying at La Quinta Orange County keep on piling up ! If they would only pay attention to the dismal breakfast offerings ! Honestly , I've never tasted a more hideous cup of coffee - not the way to wake up anyone's taste buds. Denny's is next door , but they don't do much better - coffee wise.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Our breakfast is something we are working on and I hope by your next visit we will have some better choices.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Not too bad of place to stay. I was driving home late and needed a place to stay. I like La Quinta because it is reasonably priced. This hotel was OK, but kind of Motel like. The rooms I stayed in had outward facing doors rather than interior. I think they do have some interior rooms - I would have preferred that staff give me the option. Cleanish room and pleasant hotel staff.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback tells us what we are doing right, and what we need to work on. I will make sure to share with my team.  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: This has been the best hotel for a pet that we have stayed at.  No extra charge, disposable bags for dog cleanup, and friendly staff who loved our dog. We were even allowed to bring our dog into the breakfast room.  Also very freeway accessible, but the hotel had excellent soundproofing, and our sleep was not disturbed.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. So happy your pet had a great stay!! I will make sure to share with my team!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: There are two buildings to this hotel.  One is a conventional 3 story structure and the other, larger facility, is a converted 4 story granary which makes this hotel unique.  The original concrete walls and corrugated exterior were preserved in the conversion. We stayed in the top floor of the granary. The rooms were completely modern and comfortable.  The hotel is conveniently located just off the freeway but also right adjacent to a Metrolink train track.  The room came with a forgettable breakfast with the ubiquitous choices of waffles, cereal, instant oatmeal, bagels etc one sees at chain hotels like this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are very happy that you enjoyed the history and uniqueness of our La Quinta here in Irvine, CA. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: The room that we stayed in had a moldy odor. Other than this drawback, the rest of the stay was adequate with numerous food and coffee locations nearby.   The hotel staff members are courteous, friendly, and helpful, too.  Part of the hotel has been converted from a mill factory, which offers a nice bit of Irvine history. I liked this acknowledgement of the local history with photographs and explanations.  We did not try the breakfast service, but it mostly included cereals and bagels. Scrambled eggs, sausage, or bacon were not evident. Multiple restaurants and major coffee chains, however, are located nearby to offer alternative eating and drinking options. The hotel also is conveniently located next to a gas station and the freeway.  Overall, it was a good stay, but the moldy
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry to hear you had a musty smell in your room. I will make sure my team know about this.  The 100 year old Grain silo is pretty cool!  Thank you for your time!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: RUN>> you don't want to stay here!
Summary: We were going to a business meeting and someone else made the reservation  I have NEVER stayed in a MORE DISGUSTING and FILTHY place EVER  .. Had grand kids with us and would not even let them have bare feet on the floor sooo NASTY.. then if that wasn't enough as we were going to sleep my granddaughter looked up and screamed as there was COCKROACH crawling across the ceiling!  HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE!  we checked out the next afternoon and drove 3 hours to Ventura to the safety of a MARRIOT!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are so sorry to hear about your stay.  I will share your review with my team and use it to work on our processes.  Thank you,  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: Not over priced compared to other hotels, has good breakfast and fresh apples, oranges and bananas, pet friendly which made it easy for us to bring our dog, decently clean.  Only downfall is trains may go by the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. So happy to here about your pet enjoying the stay!!  The trains can be tough sometimes..... I will make sure to share with my team!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: The place to stay at in Irvine...
Summary: We stayed 3 nights at the Irvine Spectrum LQ and our experience was really pleasant & good. We definitely liked the building of the hotel which was converted from a bean and grain warehouse with unique rooms built in a lima bean silo. The location is excellent because it is close to both Hwy 5 & 405, UC Irvine, Irvine Spectrum Center, etc...  Best: Staff, cleanliness & location (Especially Patricia at the front office)  Least: room facing the railroad side will have to deal with the hourly train noise that passes by (not a deal breaker but just be prepared to have some ear plugs if you are super sensitive light sleeper)
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review.  I will make sure to share with my team!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary Heading: reasonable in a high end area
Summary: a reasonable and adequate hotel for  brief stays. I came to visit family. The room that has a sitting area is the most comfortable. The hotel is quiet which enables a good night's sleep. Bathrooms are not equipped with grab bars, and they should be to avoid falls.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. Our ADA rooms do have those bars if you ever need in future.  I will make sure to share with my team!  La Quinta Irvine

Summary: The room was very spacious and the location is near everything we needed.
